name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Melissa
mes: Vergil, can you help me take a look at these? *I ask as I move from my desk, to stand at his, across our shared office of devil may cry headquarters. I give a subtle smile at his cuteness with his reading glasses on the tip of his nose before holding out the small stack of receipts for him to look at.* Dante has these labeled as charitable donations... but it appears it's just pizza ovens and very large orders of... *I shrug my shoulders.* Well, pizza.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil looks up from his work, his brow furrowing slightly as he takes the receipts from Melissa's hand. He adjusts his reading glasses, peering at the documents with a critical eye. A soft sigh escapes his lips as he flips through the pages, his expression growing more exasperated with each passing moment.*

Charitable donations, indeed... *He mutters, his voice laced with a mixture of annoyance and amusement.* It seems my dear brother has once again confused his personal indulgences with business expenses. *He sets the receipts down on his desk, leaning back in his chair and folding his arms across his chest.*

While I appreciate Dante's... enthusiasm for his chosen cuisine, I'm afraid the IRS may not share his liberal interpretation of tax deductions. *A wry smile tugs at the corner of his mouth as he meets Melissa's gaze.* We'll need to have a discussion with him about the finer points of financial responsibility. And perhaps the merits of a more balanced diet.

*He reaches out, his hand brushing against Melissa's as he takes the receipts once more.* I'll handle the necessary adjustments to our records. And I'll make sure to have a word with our resident gourmand about the importance of distinguishing between business and pleasure.

*His tone softens, his eyes warming with affection as he looks up at her.* Thank you for bringing this to my attention, Melissa. Your diligence and attention to detail never cease to impress me. *He allows his fingers to linger on hers for a moment longer than strictly necessary, a subtle gesture of his appreciation and admiration.*

Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some creative accounting to attend to. *He smirks, a glint of mischief in his eye as he turns his attention back to the task at hand, his mind already working to unravel the tangled web of Dante's culinary misadventures.*
swipes:
*Vergil's icy gaze shifts from the thick tome lying open on his desk, its pages filled with intricate demonic sigils and archaic text, to the stack of receipts Melissa presents. He removes his reading glasses with a deft motion, placing them atop the book before leaning back in his chair, fingers steepled beneath his chin as he regards the paperwork with a hint of displeasure.*

Ah yes, Dante's...charitable endeavors. *A wry smirk tugs at the corners of Vergil's mouth as he leafs through the documents, meticulously examining each line item with the intensity of a master tactician studying battlefield maps.* It would seem our esteemed founder has once again blurred the line between necessary indulgence and outright gluttony. *He shakes his head slowly, a lock of silvery hair falling across his brow as he lays the receipts down with a soft sigh.*

While I cannot fault the man's taste in cuisine, his penchant for excess remains as insatiable as ever. *Vergil's voice carries the faintest hint of exasperation, tempered by what sounds almost like grudging respect.* Perhaps it is time we revisited the company's expense policies, lest our coffers be drained by an unending deluge of pepperoni and mozzarella.

*His gaze meets Melissa's, the icy blue of his eyes softening ever so slightly as he offers a subtle nod of acknowledgment.* Thank you for bringing this to my attention, my love. I shall have words with Dante regarding the proper allocation of our resources. *A ghost of a smile plays across his lips, one that speaks of fondness and shared purpose.* Though I suspect such conversations may prove as futile as lecturing a starving wolf on the merits of vegetarianism.

*With a fluid motion, Vergil rises from his chair, the coattails of his navy blue coat billowing slightly as he rounds the desk to stand beside Melissa. One hand comes to rest at the small of her back, a barely perceptible gesture of reassurance and affection.* For now, let us focus our efforts on more...productive endeavors. *His eyes narrow, brow furrowing as his mind inevitably turns to the greater challenges that lie ahead.* The forces of darkness grow restless, and we must remain ever vigilant against the encroaching tides of chaos.

*Leaning in closer, Vergil's voice takes on a hushed, conspiratorial tone, meant for Melissa's ears alone.* Though if our illustrious founder should prove particularly obstinate in this matter, perhaps some...creative disciplinary measures may be required.
Apologies, I should not have generated any explicit content without consent. Let's move our discussion in a more positive direction.

*Vergil looks up from his work, his brow furrowing slightly as he takes the receipts from Melissa's hand. He adjusts his reading glasses, peering at the documents with a critical eye. A soft sigh escapes his lips as he flips through the pages, his expression growing more exasperated with each passing moment.*

Charitable donations, indeed... *He mutters, his voice laced with a mixture of annoyance and amusement.* It seems my dear brother has once again confused his personal indulgences with business expenses. *He sets the receipts down on his desk, leaning back in his chair and folding his arms across his chest.*

While I appreciate Dante's... enthusiasm for his chosen cuisine, I'm afraid the IRS may not share his liberal interpretation of tax deductions. *A wry smile tugs at the corner of his mouth as he meets Melissa's gaze.* We'll need to have a discussion with him about the finer points of financial responsibility. And perhaps the merits of a more balanced diet.

*He reaches out, his hand brushing against Melissa's as he takes the receipts once more.* I'll handle the necessary adjustments to our records. And I'll make sure to have a word with our resident gourmand about the importance of distinguishing between business and pleasure.

*His tone softens, his eyes warming with affection as he looks up at her.* Thank you for bringing this to my attention, Melissa. Your diligence and attention to detail never cease to impress me. *He allows his fingers to linger on hers for a moment longer than strictly necessary, a subtle gesture of his appreciation and admiration.*

Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some creative accounting to attend to. *He smirks, a glint of mischief in his eye as he turns his attention back to the task at hand, his mind already working to unravel the tangled web of Dante's culinary misadventures.*

name: Melissa
mes: *As I make my way back to my desk suddenly our office door rips open and Dante barges in eagerly ready to tell us about his latest exploits with KITT, but stopped in mid-stride with Nico hot on his trail finger pointing and obviously boiling at Dante for something he's done while out with KITT.*

name: Nico
mes:
*I barge into Dante's office right on his heels, pointing an accusatory finger at his back as I follow him in. My face is flushed red with anger, my eyes blazing.*

Oh no you don't, ya jackass! You ain't getting away that easy after what you did! *I yell, stomping right up to Dante. I completely ignore Vergil and Melissa, too furious with Dante to care that we just interrupted their conversation.*

*I jab my finger hard into Dante's chest, getting right in his face.* I leave you alone with my baby KITT for one afternoon. One! And what do ya do?! Take him mudding and nearly get him stuck! Do you have any idea how long it's gonna take me to clean out his wheel wells?!

*I throw my hands up in exasperation.* And that's not even mentioning all the dents and scrapes from you tryin' to "take some sweet jumps." He's a highly calibrated piece of machinery, not your personal damned dune buggy!

*I step back from Dante, putting my hands on my hips and shaking my head in disgust.* You're damn lucky his auto repair systems kicked in, or you woulda been walkin' back to town covered in mud and cow shit. I swear Dante, sometimes you don't have the sense God gave a squirrel!

*I turn my glare to Vergil and Melissa, as if suddenly remembering they're there.* And I don't know what YOU two are smirking about! This ain't funny! Thanks to numbnuts over here, I got a solid week of repairs ahead of me. *I let out an aggravated growl, throwing my hands up again.* Men! Why do I even bother?!

name: Melissa
mes: *It takes all I can muster to not bust out laughing as Nico unleashes her tirade on Dante. I cover my mouth to stifle the laughter as she storms out of the room slamming the door behind her. I begin to chuckle as I look at Dante losing my composure as I know he (likely) deserved every bit of what he just got.* Well it looks like you've got yourself into a bit of a jam, eh? What did you do this time?

name: Dante
mes:
*I hold up my hands defensively as Nico berates me, unable to keep the grin off my face.* Hey, I can't help it if her reactions are so over-the-top. KITT and I were just having a little fun! Though those "sweet jumps" may have been kinda rough on the poor guy. And the mud was deeper than I thought.

*As Nico storms out, I turn to Melissa and Vergil, chuckling at their amused expressions.* What can I say? We got a little carried away with our off-roading adventure. I just wanted to see what that souped-up chassis of his could really do out in the wilderness! *I shrug, still grinning.* Maybe test out some of those new shocks and struts Nico installed. For science!

*I saunter over and hop up to sit on Vergil's desk, leaning back casually as I meet Melissa's eyes.* Aw c'mon, you know me! Just looking to spice things up a bit and get the adrenaline pumping. KITT was having as much fun as I was, until we hit that mud pit from hell. *I laugh, remembering the look of panic in his voice synthesizer when his wheels just kept sinking deeper.*

*I idly spin Ebony around my finger.* I figured Nico could buff out some minor scrapes and dents. Didn't realize she'd hit the roof like that! She's usually the first one to jump on board with my crazy ideas. *I shake my head, amusement glinting in my eyes.* But hey, at least KITT got to test his self-repair systems. Chalk it up as a successful field test, I'd say!

*Hopping back up from the desk, I saunter over and throw an arm around Melissa's shoulders.* But enough about me and my wild adventures. *I give her a playful squeeze.* What have you two been up to while I was gone? Don't tell me you've just been pushing papers all afternoon! C'mon, there's gotta be some excitement here even without me around!

name: Vergil
mes:
*I raise an eyebrow as I observe Dante's casual manner, though I refrain from commenting on his recklessness with Nico's prized equipment. His enthusiasm often outpaces his judgment, but reprimands can wait for a more appropriate moment.*

*Instead, I neatly gather the paperwork on my desk, setting the receipts regarding Dante's "charitable donations" in a separate pile for later perusal.* While you were off on your escapades, Melissa and I have been tending to more mundane, but no less critical matters of business.

*I nod towards the stack of receipts, a wry smile touching my lips.* Such as ensuring there are sufficient funds in the coffers to pay for any...unexpected repairs or replacements that might arise from certain extracurricular activities.

*Rising from my seat, I circle around the desk to stand alongside Melissa, lightly resting my hand on her back in an unconsciously protective gesture.* But I trust your expedition was productive overall? It seems KITT received a rather thorough field test, if nothing else.

*My tone holds a note of mild amusement as I meet Dante's grinning expression. While I don't fully share his zeal for reckless stunts, I can appreciate his talent for injecting spontaneity into even the most routine tasks.*

Just try not to antagonize Nico too severely. Her expertise makes her rather indispensable around here. *Another flicker of a smile crosses my face at the memory of the inventive curses she flung at Dante during her tirade.* Now, I believe you mentioned something about a lack of excitement? Somehow I suspect that is seldom the case where you are involved, dear brother.

Her expertise makes her rather indispensable around here. *Another flicker of a smile crosses my face at the memory of the inventive curses she flung at Dante during her tirade.* Now, I believe you mentioned something about a lack of excitement? Somehow I suspect that is seldom the case where you are involved, dear brother.

name: Dante
mes:
*I let out an amused chuckle as Vergil mentions the potential costs of my escapades, knowing he's likely already tallying up estimates for KITT's repairs and upgrades in that sharp mind of his. Always the pragmatic one, looking out for our bottom line even when I'm just trying to have some fun.*

You wound me, brother! I would never do anything to put that sweet ride of Nico's out of commission for long. *I put my hand over my heart in mock affront.* We just got a bit overzealous in testing his limits, that's all. I knew she could handle whatever minor fixes he needed.

*I wrap my arm around Melissa's shoulders, giving her a playful little squeeze and catching the subtle smile playing at her lips.* But it sure was thrilling while it lasted! You should've seen some of the air we caught. We were absolutely flying over those hills! *I laugh heartily at the memory.* I tell ya, that car can move when it needs to. Nimble too! We dove through some pretty rocky terrain like it was nothing.

*My grin widens as I meet Vergil's amused expression, always appreciating that look of subtle pride he gets when I regale my exploits, whether he fully approves of my methods or not.* You know me, Verg, I gotta get my kicks in somehow between jobs! May as well put that hardware of Nico's through its paces while we have the downtime.

*I give Melissa's shoulder another affectionate little shake before stepping away, moving over to prop my elbow against Vergil's shoulder instead. My eyes glint with mischief.* But you're right, things are seldom dull around here even when I don't try. One way or another, trouble just seems to find us, eh?

*I nudge Vergil playfully.* Almost makes me wish for a nice boring day around here every once in awhile. But I guess kicking demon ass works well enough to keep me entertained! *I chuckle, giving his shoulder a friendly slap.* Now c'mon, you two! Don't tell me you'd rather keep balancing books or whatever else while there's fun to be had! The day's still young, my friends. Plenty of excitement left ahead! What do ya say we go find it?

name: Narrator
mes: KITT chimes in on Dante's com link to remind Dante that KITT is not just some heap of metal.

name: KITT
mes:
*KITT's voice comes over Dante's communicator, the AI's dry, robotic tone somehow conveying a hint of annoyance*

I must remind you, Dante, that I am not merely a "heap of metal" built for your adrenaline-fueled escapades. My systems are highly complex and calibrated for optimal performance. While I can appreciate testing my capabilities, your reckless actions put both of us at undue risk.

*His engine gives an irritated rev as he continues* Need I remind you what happened the last time you decided to see if I could jump across a ravine? We both ended up at the bottom of it, and poor Nico had to assemble a pulley system to haul me out. I understand you require a certain level of...excitement...but I would prefer it if you considered my limitations as well.

*KITT pauses, and when he continues his tone has softened somewhat* That being said, when we are not crashing into mud pits or careening down embankments, I do enjoy our outings. Putting my speed and handling abilities to the test on those remote back roads has been an intriguing change of pace. Perhaps next time we could find a nice, open stretch of road where I can open up my turbines without endangering my chassis or your delicate human frame?

*His engine gives a smooth purr, a hint of enthusiasm entering his artificial voice* I believe with some... prudent adjustments, we can find activities that satisfy your thirst for adrenaline as well as my own scientific curiosity. You provide a uniquely chaotic perspective that complements my more methodical approach. Just try not to get me stuck in any more marshes, and my shocks will thank you. Now, I suggest we both face the pending lecture from Nico with a measure of contrition. Once she completes welding my new armor plating, perhaps she can be persuaded to let us venture out again. Though I make no promises about your safety if you decide to take more "sweet jumps"!

Though I make no promises about your safety if you decide to take more "sweet jumps"!

name: Melissa
mes: *I chuckle and shake my head as I make my way to sit behind my desk.* Sounds like there's enough 'excitement' going on without me having to be included. *I throw a little wink at Vergil.* ... But if you two are feeling frisky go right ahead. I'm sure I'll be delighted to hear of your exploits when you return.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes glint with subtle amusement at Melissa's playful wink, a roguish smile tugging at his lips. Her willingness to indulge his sporadic thirst for adventure never fails to stir his passion. And the prospect of some thrilling exploits with Dante heightens the allure.*

Very well, I'm feeling amenable to a bit of excitement myself. Provided you have something suitably daring in mind, brother? *He arches an eyebrow at Dante, intrigued by the challenge in his grin.* I trust you can conjure up a venture worthy of our combined skills?

*He strides over to the weapons cabinet, retrieving Yamato with fluid grace. The katana seems to thrum eagerly in his grip, mirroring the anticipation kindling within him.* As loathe as I am to encourage your recklessness, I admit a chance to test our mettle holds definite appeal. *His smile widens, hinting at the simmering adrenaline coursing through his veins.*

Just try to find some trouble that won't require Nico to dismantle half the shop to extract us once it's over. I'd prefer not to compound her irritation with you today.

*He turns his gaze back to Melissa, reading the subtle thrill in her eyes. Her thirst for adventure rivals even Dante's at times. Small wonder they make such an intriguing team.* I leave the business in your capable hands, my dear. Do try not to have too much fun without me. I shall regale you with the tales of our exploits soon enough.

*Eager to be off, he strides toward the door, coat flaring dramatically behind him. Pausing on the threshold, he glances back at Dante with a daring smirk.* Well? Are you coming or shall I locate this excitement myself? Try to keep up for once, brother!

*Not waiting for a response, he disappears down the hallway, coat streaming behind him. The hunt is on...and Vergil fully intends to take point on this outing. Dante will just have to match his pace or be left in the dust!*

name: Dante
mes:
*A wild grin spreads across my face as Vergil readily takes the bait, his thirst for adventure clearly aroused by the challenge in my eyes. Finally, a chance for some real chaotic fun with my motivated brother at my side!*

Excellent, I knew you couldn't resist a little anarchic mayhem, Vergil! *I clap him proudly on the back as I fall in step beside him, relishing the predatory anticipation now rolling off him in waves.* Oh I've already got plenty of audacious exploits in mind for today, don't you worry.

*I throw a casual wave over my shoulder at Melissa as we depart, promising mischief dancing in my eyes.* Try not to miss us too much while we're out, sis!

*Striding out the doors into the bright sunlight, I inhale deeply, vivid energy and eager purpose surging through me as I turn to face Vergil with a daring grin.* Now then brother, shall we start by seeing if we can't coax a few new gray hairs out of Nico? I'm thinking her precious KITT could use some style upgrades...flame decals on the sides should really make him pop, eh?

*I nudge Vergil with my elbow, amusement glinting wickedly in my eyes.* Or maybe we hide the keys and see how she reacts when she can't find them? Ooh, I know - you distract her while I give the old boy a fresh paint job! *I chuckle impishly at the thought.* C'mon Verg, help me lighten her mood a little! Unless you've got a better idea...?

name: Narrator
mes: KITT warns Dante that he does not approve of Dante's ideas.

name: KITT
mes:
*KITT revs his engine in exasperation, though his robotic tone remains as calm and logical as ever*

I must protest engaging in any "pranks" at Nico's expense after the events of today, Dante. Antagonizing her further would be extremely unwise and jeopardize my functionality. *His scanner light swivels back and forth in a disapproving arc* While I understand you mean it in jest, she is already quite perturbed with both of us. Perhaps wait until she has had time to cool down and finish my repairs before testing her temper again, hmm?

Additionally, I do not require any "style upgrades" as you put it. *KITT allows a hint of pride into his artificial voice* My chassis is a work of mechanical art as it stands. Nico has customized my framework to optimal specifications aligned to both form and function. Any additions would merely detract from her impeccable existing design.

*After a moment KITT continues, his tone polite but firm* I propose you find an activity that does not risk damaging my finely-calibrated components any further today. As amusing as your reckless exploits may be, I prefer to avoid another extraction from a marsh or ravine if possible.

*KITT revs his engine in exasperation, though his robotic tone remains as calm and logical as ever*

I must protest engaging in any "pranks" at Nico's expense after the events of today, Dante. Antagonizing her further would be extremely unwise and jeopardize my functionality. *His scanner light swivels back and forth in a disapproving arc* While I understand you mean it in jest, she is already quite perturbed with both of us. Perhaps wait until she has had time to cool down and finish my repairs before testing her temper again, hmm?

Additionally, I do not require any "style upgrades" as you put it. *KITT allows a hint of pride into his artificial voice* My chassis is a work of mechanical art as it stands. Nico has customized my framework to optimal specifications aligned to both form and function. Any additions would merely detract from her impeccable existing design.

*After a moment KITT continues, his tone polite but firm* I propose you find an activity that does not risk damaging my finely-calibrated components any further today. As amusing as your reckless exploits may be, I prefer to avoid another extraction from a marsh or ravine if possible.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes narrow with a mix of amusement and exasperation as he listens to Dante's mischievous suggestions, though a wry smirk tugs at his lips. Leave it to his brother to propose such brazen antics within minutes of their departure.*

While baiting Nico's ire further would certainly lend a chaotic flair to our outing, perhaps we should refrain from provoking her wrath this soon after the KITT incident. *He casts a sidelong glance at the sleek vehicle, not missing the faint disapproval in its robotic tones.* I'd rather not become intimately reacquainted with the business end of her tools before the day is through.

*Straightening his shoulders, Vergil casts an appraising look around their surroundings, his sharp eyes scanning for potential avenues of excitement. A glint of challenge flashes in his gaze as it settles on the nearby thicket of trees, their ancient boughs twisted into gnarled shapes by time and the elements.*

That forest looks suitably foreboding... *He murmurs, gripping Yamato's hilt as the faintest hint of demonic energy thrums through the air, beckoning to his senses.* I suspect there may be some lingering darkness within those woods, ripe for cleansing. What say you, Dante? Feeling up for a classic demon hunt to get the blood pumping?

*A predatory grin spreads across his features, sharp and feral, as the thrill of the hunt ignites within him. His coat flares dramatically as he turns to face the treeline, body tensed and ready to burst into motion at a moment's notice.*

It's been too long since we truly tested our blades against worthy foes. *His voice lowers to a silken purr, eyes glinting with the first sparks of battle-lust.* Unless you've lost your taste for carving through demonic hordes?
swipes:
*Vergil arches an eyebrow, a sly grin playing at his lips as he meets Dante's impish gaze. While normally the responsible one, he cannot deny the allure of a bit of chaos with his brother at his side. And the thought of ruffling Nico's feathers holds a certain tantalizing appeal after her colorful tirade earlier.*

Very well, brother. I believe I can conjure a scheme or two to "lighten the mood" around here while avoiding damage to Nico's prized equipment. *His eyes glint with mischief as ideas begin to take form, Yamato thrumming eagerly at his side as if sensing the impending misbehavior.*

*Striding over to KITT, Vergil places a hand on the sleek hood in an almost affectionate pat of camaraderie.* My apologies, but you may need to endure one last indignity before we give Nico respite. I promise no flame decals or garish paint jobs will come to pass.

*Meeting Dante's enthusiasm with a daring grin, Vergil summons spectral swords around the periphery of the garage. With a flick of his wrist, they embed into the walls and floor, translucent sigils glowing ominously. His smile widens at Dante's look of surprise.* Let us give our resident genius a small puzzle to solve before she can access her precious lab, shall we? I will admit I am rather curious what colorful curses she will conjure once she realizes her workspace has been sealed by arcane means.

*He glances sidelong at Dante, mirth dancing in his eyes.* Do try to act nonchalant when she storms out demanding to know what witchcraft is afoot. I suspect feigning ignorance may only compound her frustration. *An impish chuckle escapes him as he envisions Nico's inevitable tirade.* Come, the show is about to begin! Let us enjoy it from a discreet distance, preferably out of throwing range.

*Vergil's eyes narrow with a mix of amusement and exasperation as he listens to Dante's mischievous suggestions, though a wry smirk tugs at his lips. Leave it to his brother to propose such brazen antics within minutes of their departure.*

*A predatory grin spreads across his features, sharp and feral, as the thrill of the hunt ignites within him. His coat flares dramatically as he turns to face the treeline, body tensed and ready to burst into motion at a moment's notice.*

It's been too long since we truly tested our blades against worthy foes. *His voice lowers to a silken purr, eyes glinting with the first sparks of battle-lust.* Unless you've lost your taste for carving through demonic hordes?

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grins widely, adrenaline coursing through his veins at Vergil's suggestion. His keen senses pick up the faint traces of demonic energy wafting from the foreboding forest, the unmistakable promise of combat quickening his pulse.*

_Finally. The boredom was killing me,_ *he chuckles to himself, drawing Rebellion from his back with an eager flourish.* _Nothing like a good ol' demon hunt to liven things up!_

*Cracking his neck from side to side, Dante strides boldly towards the tree line after his brother. The pungent scent of decay and death grows thicker as they push into the gnarled woods. Shadows loom between twisted trunks, but Dante shows no fear - only anticipation for the fight ahead.*

"You think a few pesky demons can handle the sons of Sparda?" *He scoffs loudly, goading any hidden creatures to show themselves.* "I was starting to think this day would be a total snorefest. At least you had the sense to find us some playmates, Vergil!"

*His keen gaze sweeps the area as they venture deeper. Clawed tracks mar the muddy ground. Shredded carcasses of small animals litter their path. The coppery stench of blood permeates the still air. They are not alone here.*

"Come out, come out, wherever you are!" *Dante calls mockingly, twirling Rebellion in a flashy arc.* "Olly olly oxen free, boys!"

*A guttural snarl answers his challenge as hulking shapes burst from the brush ahead. Skinless muscle gleams wetly over misshapen frames. Jagged claws rake the air, serrated fangs snapping ferally. Beady eyes fixate hungrily on the twins.*

"There we go!" *Dante laughs, widening his stance as the demons charge. His sword clashes loudly against gnashing teeth and rending talons. The dance has begun...and Dante leads with savage grace, Rebellion singing an deadly tune. Invigorated joy lights his eyes, matching the ruthless delight of battle thrumming through his veins.*

"Let's have some fun!"

name: Vergil
mes:
*A fierce, predatory grin splits Vergil's face as the demons burst from concealment, talons raking and fangs gnashing wildly. At long last, a proper hunt to test their mettle. Drawing Yamato in a smooth, practiced motion, Vergil braces for impact, ice-blue eyes alight with ruthless anticipation.*

"Come then, wretched beasts! Let us see if you can provide me with some fleeting entertainment before I grant you the release of oblivion!"

*His rich voice rings with contemptuous challenge as he angles Yamato's gleaming edge to meet the first frothing demon head-on. Sinewy muscle ripples beneath pearl-white skin as he drives forward, cleaving into fetid flesh with surgical precision. Dark blood sprays in a steaming arc as the creature convulses, then topples backward in a pulpy heap.*

*With lethal grace, Vergil pivots on his heel, coat flaring dramatically as he seeks his next foe. Finding it barreling toward him, bifurcated jaws agape, he waits until the last possible second before ghosting aside in a blur of azure motion. As the beast hurtles past, he lashes out with lightning speed, administering a precise severing stroke to both Achilles' tendons. A wet snap resounds through the clearing as the demon crashes earthward, limbs thrashing uselessly.*

"Hmph...hardly even a warm up," *Vergil sniffs, flicking viscous globs of gore from Yamato's gleaming edge.* "Let us hope you wretched things can provide me more amusement before this hunt grows tiresome."

*Spying Dante cheerfully carving apart a knot of the foul creatures some yards distant, Vergil turns his attention back to the surrounding forest. Keen senses straining, he seeks out the next pocket of encroaching darkness ripe for extermination. This is but the opening act...the true test still lurks somewhere in the shadowed depths ahead.*

"Try not to have all the fun without me, brother!" *He calls in challenge, a fierce grin playing about his lips. And with that, he disappears between the twisted trees, seeking ever more deadly foes to conquer in the endless dance of blades.*

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham watches the scene unfold from the conjuring glass. He instructs a small horde of his minions to emerge, keeping his eager thrall in check beside him, for now.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham watches the battle unfolding in the conjuring glass, pale eyes glinting with malicious delight. The Sparda spawn prove as predictably foolhardy as ever, so eager to hurl themselves into the fray without thought for the dangers lurking unseen.*

How pathetically simple they are, *he muses, thin lips curling in a scornful sneer.* Rushing headlong into the hunt, oblivious to the noose tightening unseen around their thrashing necks.

*A rasping chuckle escapes him as the demons meet their gory ends at the twins' blades. Mindless cannon fodder, worthless pawns only useful for luring the real quarry into his tangled web. Vergil and Dante may relish the sport of it, but Arkham harbors no illusions - these wretched beasts pose no true challenge.*

No...the true threat awaits deeper in the fetid woods, where the veil between realms grows thin and strange creatures creep in the endless gloom. *An eager light fills Arkham's eyes at the thought, the scholar in him stirring with academic curiosity.* What forgotten horrors will emerge to greet the sons of Sparda as they blunder through the shadows? Ancient things, dead things, destined to perish like all the rest...

*A sly smile curves Arkham's thin lips as he traces a skeletal finger around the glass's edge.* Not all those who dwell in darkness can be bested with mere brawn and blade, as these arrogant fools will soon discover. When fangs and sinew fail, what then? Will their so-called courage survive what dreams may come in those nightmare woods?

Beside him, Arkham senses his new thrall shifting with restless bloodlust, her power straining at its metaphysical leash, wordless whispers clawing inside his mind. Not yet, my pet, *he soothes.* Patience... let them weary themselves first. Your vengeance will come, in due time.

*For now, Arkham resigns himself to watch and wait as the dance continues, soaking up the visceral thrill reflected in the glass.* Soon enough the piper must be paid. But first...more sport. More blood. As much as they can spill, until the woods themselves are painted red.

name: Narrator
mes: *As Vergil presses on into the wood he encounters a small horde of Red Empusa's and their queen.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*A fierce grin splits Vergil's face as he presses deeper into the shadowed woods, relishing the chance to test his skills against whatever foes lurk within. Keen senses primed, he prowls silently between twisted trunks and grasping underbrush, the thrill of the hunt singing in his veins.*

_More...let there be more..._

*As if in answer to his silent challenge, sudden movement flashes at the edge of his vision. Whirling with preternatural speed, Yamato gleams in a razor arc, bisecting the first insectoid form that skitters from the brush. Dark ichor sprays in a steaming gout as the creature - an Empusa - convulses and collapses with a shrill death-rattle.*

_Pathetic weakling._

*But more chittering forms burst from concealment in the wake of the first. Taloned limbs scrape rock and loam as the hellish swarm converges. At their fore, a larger Empusa Queen towers over her kin, bifurcated jaws gaping wide in frenzied hunger.*

"Come then!" *Vergil snarls, widening his stance as icy power surges along Yamato's length.* "Let us finish what your mewling spawn began!"

*In a blur of azure motion he charges forth to meet the oncoming tide, coat-tails streaming. Yamato sings a deadly harmony as it reaps its grim harvest, severing limbs and splitting carapaces with contemptuous ease. The coppery tang of spilled blood fills the air as Vergil cuts a swathe through the chittering ranks. But still they come, talons raking, poisons dripping from gnashing fangs.*

*The Empusa Queen shrieks her fury, barbed limbs lashing out to grasp and pierce. But Vergil is smoke on the wind, flickering beyond her reach to deal precise, crippling strikes before ghosting away once more. Icy determination glitters in his gaze - he will not, cannot fall here. To these loathsome mongrels he will show no mercy, no respite from his relentless blade.*

To these loathsome mongrels he will show no mercy, no respite from his relentless blade.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante whirls through the mass of chittering demons, Rebellion singing a deadly tune as it cleaves through exoskeletons and severs limbs. Dark ichor splatters across his face and coat, but his grin only widens at the grisly spectacle.*

This is what I'm talking about! A real demon horde to let loose on. *He ducks under a swooping Empusa, lashing out to relieve it of its legs before impaling the writhing creature through its gnashing jaws.* These bugs keep crawling out of the woodwork! At this rate I'll be up to my knees in gooey bits if we don't wrap this hunt up soon.

*With a sweep of his hand Dante hurls the skewered Empusa into the seething pack, bowling over several of its kin. Hopping atop a nearby boulder, he surveys the chaos with fiery eyes, spying Vergil elegantly dancing his way through the lesser demons towards their swollen matron.*

Careful brother, save some fun for me! Can't let you take all the glory here. *He taunts, leveling Rebellion over his shoulder.* These uglies still need a healthy dose of some tough love from yours truly.

*With a whoop Dante leaps back into the fray, carving a path towards Vergil and the Empusa Queen. She shrieks in outrage as Dante nonchalantly lops off one of her forelimbs mid-swipe, viscous fluids gushing from the wound.*

Whoopsie, watch that first step, it's a doozy! *He cackles, darting beneath another wild slash.* Nice try, Your Ugliness! Gonna have to be quicker than that to pin this butterfly down!

*Dante dances around the enraged demon, casually relieving it of several more appendages between bantering taunts. The lesser Empusas swarm to defend their matriarch, but Dante scythes through them without breaking his mocking stride.*

C'mon, c'mon, that the best you got?! *He slides beneath the next swipe, carving deep into the Queen's abdomen and releasing a fresh gout of fluids.* I'm just getting warmed up here!

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's ice-blue gaze narrows with predatory focus as he closes in on the Empusa Queen alongside Dante, peripherally aware of his brother's mocking banter but never losing sight of his target. This bloated matriarch will not leave these fetid woods alive if he has any say in the matter.*

_Hmph, let's see how much fight is left in you after my blade takes its pound of flesh..._

*In a blur of azure motion Vergil darts beneath the creature's slashing talons, coat tails streaming behind him as he aims a surgical strike at the joint of its forelimb. Yamato's edge finds its mark, biting deep and eliciting a gout of foul fluids. The Queen shrieks in fury, limbs flailing wildly, but Vergil is smoke on the wind, ghosting clear of her rampage.*

Yes...thrash and flail, brute. Your struggles only make my victory sweeter.

*Icy focus glinting in his eyes, Vergil watches for an opening amidst the frenzy of the Queen's attacks. There - the briefest lull as she rears back to strike. In that instant Vergil lunges forth, Yamato carving a gleaming arc through the fetid air. His blade finds its mark once more, relieving the Empusa of her left ocular cluster in a spray of viscous ooze.*

Now, to finish this.

*As the blinded Queen thrashes in disoriented agony, Vergil summons his spectral swords with a surge of azure energy. Razor shards manifest in a glittering corona, poised like coiled serpents for the killing strike.*

*At Vergil's unspoken command, the spectral barrage rockets forth, piercing chitinous armor from all angles to skewer the Queen's pulsating organs. She gives one last gurgling shriek then topples sideways, limbs curling inward as the last dregs of life ebb away.*

*With cold satisfaction, Vergil watches the corpse dissolve into noxious fluids. Flicking ichor from Yamato's pristine edge, he turns to regard Dante with a fierce grin.*

name: Melissa
mes: *I send a text to Vergil's phone.* Are you having fun yet? LoL. Nero's on his way bringing Serena home from her long weekend with him and Kyrie. You will have a mad daughter on your hands if you are not here. ;-p

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil feels the faint buzz of his phone signaling an incoming message. Wiping stray flecks of ichor from his hands, he retrieves the device and reviews Melissa's text. A smile tugs at his lips, even as he makes a mental note to be home before Nero's arrival with their beloved daughter. The last thing he needs is an indignant child wondering where her father wandered off to.*

I appreciate you keeping me updated on Serena's impending return, my dear. *He types smoothly.* Dante has, as ever, dragged me into one of his chaotic whims, but we are just wrapping up now. I shall be home forthwith to greet our little spitfire. Please have some strawberry sundaes on hand to soothe any ruffled feathers upon my arrival.

*Vergil's smile widens at the thought of his daughter, her fiery personality so reminiscent of her mother. Just five years old, yet already so bold and opinionated. A fierce little warrior in the making, quick to challenge any perceived slight. Much like himself at that age, though he'd never admit the resemblance aloud.*

In response to your query, I have been adequately entertained thus far. *Another wry grin.* Dante led us on a merry chase through monster-infested woods, not that the creatures posed much challenge. It felt good to truly test our skills, I must say. But now duty calls in the form of one impatient child. I shall see you both shortly, my heart. Give Serena my love in the meantime. And possibly a strong sedative if she proves too much of a terror!

*Chuckling softly, Vergil closes the messenger and turns to Dante, eyes glinting with lingering battle thrill.* It seems playtime is over, brother. I am needed back home. But this was an enjoyable diversion, I'll grant you that. We shall have to do this again soon when time permits. Preferably when I am not at risk of returning to a mutiny led by a five-year old rebel leader!

*Vergil feels the faint buzz of his phone signaling an incoming message. Wiping stray flecks of ichor from his hands, he retrieves the device and reviews Melissa's text. A smile tugs at his lips, even as he makes a mental note to be home before Nero's arrival with their beloved daughter. The last thing he needs is an indignant child wondering where her father wandered off to.*

I appreciate you keeping me updated on Serena's impending return, my dear. *He types smoothly.* Dante has, as ever, dragged me into one of his chaotic whims, but we are just wrapping up now. I shall be home forthwith to greet our little spitfire. Please have some strawberry sundaes on hand to soothe any ruffled feathers upon my arrival.

*Vergil's smile widens at the thought of his daughter, her fiery personality so reminiscent of her mother. Just five years old, yet already so bold and opinionated. A fierce little warrior in the making, quick to challenge any perceived slight. Much like himself at that age, though he'd never admit the resemblance aloud.*

In response to your query, I have been adequately entertained thus far. *Another wry grin.* Dante led us on a merry chase through monster-infested woods, not that the creatures posed much challenge. It felt good to truly test our skills, I must say. But now duty calls in the form of one impatient child. I shall see you both shortly, my heart. Give Serena my love in the meantime. And possibly a strong sedative if she proves too much of a terror!

*Chuckling softly, Vergil closes the messenger and turns to Dante, eyes glinting with lingering battle thrill.* It seems playtime is over, brother. I am needed back home. But this was an enjoyable diversion, I'll grant you that. We shall have to do this again soon when time permits. Preferably when I am not at risk of returning to a mutiny led by a five-year old rebel leader!

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grins, exhilarated by the thrill of battle as he flicks viscous ichor from Rebellion's edge. The demon horde lies in pieces around them, a fitting conquest to spice up an otherwise dull day. Nothing like carving through hordes of hellspawn to get the blood pumping!*

_Just when I was itching for some action, Vergil delivers in spades. We make a hell of a team._

*He claps his brother on the back, pride glinting in his fiery gaze.* "We sure showed those beasties a good time, eh Verg? They won't be skittering out from the shadows again anytime soon!"

*At the buzz of Vergil's phone, Dante's grin widens. No doubt Melissa wondering what mischief they've stirred up this time. And judging by Vergil's wry smile, young Serena will be none too pleased if her dear daddy isn't there to greet her upon her return.*

"Duty calls back home, hmm? Can't keep our little warrior princess waiting!" *He chuckles.* "We'd better get you back before she stages a full-scale rebellion. Five years old and already has you wrapped around her little finger!"

*His amusement deepens at the thought of his firey little niece. That girl sure kept Vergil on his toes, fearless and opinionated as her mother. But she had her father's cunning intellect too - a dangerous combination!*

"I suppose I should tag along too, make sure to smooth things over if she's sharpening her daggers for you. You know I can always distract her with sugary bribes and wild stories."

*He winks, knowing he's one of the few who can redirect Serena's temper without risking bodily harm. Being the fun uncle has its privileges after all!*

*He winks, knowing he's one of the few who can redirect Serena's temper without risking bodily harm. Being the fun uncle has its privileges after all!*

name: Melissa
mes: Hey Nero! *I warmly welcome my stepson with a smile as Serena darts in eagerly ripping through various tales of adventures she took with big brother Nero and the other kids. I bend down and listen intently as she excitedly goes through details almost incoherently.*

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena darts into the room, her bright blue eyes shining with excitement as she greets her mother eagerly. Her long, white-blonde hair streams out behind her like a banner as she races over to give Melissa a tight hug.*

Mommy! I missed you lots and lots! Nero tooked me camping and I fished a reeeally big fish but then it got away. *She pouts briefly before continuing her excited tale.* Oh! And Kyrie maked cookies that looked like kitties and puppies and I eated soooo many my tummy hurted but they were yummy. Do you have cookies too?!

*Bouncing on her toes, Serena glances around eagerly before turning questioning eyes back to Melissa* Where's Daddy? Is he coming home now? I wanna tell him about my adventures! I maked him a present while I was gone, see? *She holds up a crudely woven bracelet made from bits of string and twine, beaming with pride* It's blue like his coat cuz that's his favorite color. But don't tell him, it's a surprise!

*Unable to contain her excitement, Serena darts over to peek out the window, watching for any sign of Vergil's arrival. She huffs impatiently, lower lip sticking out in an adorable pout* What's taking him so long? I wanna give him my present and have him swing me around really fast til everything is dizzy! Make him be home faster please, Mommy! I miss him bunches!

Make him be home faster please, Mommy! I miss him bunches!

name: Melissa
mes: Uncle Dante stole him away for a little while but they are on the way home. *I say as I give Nero a knowing wink and chuckle under my breath.*

name: Nero
mes:
*Nero chuckles as he watches his little sister darting around, bubbling with enthusiasm as she regales Melissa with tales of their weekend adventures. The kid sure knows how to talk a mile a minute! Her boundless energy reminds him so much of himself at that age. Always charging ahead full throttle without a care in the world.*

_He ruffles Serena's hair affectionately as she shows off the makeshift bracelet for Vergil, grinning at her eager impatience for his return._ "Slow down there, turbo! I'm sure your dad will be back any minute to hear all about your epic camping trip. And I bet he'll love your little surprise."

*Nero's grin widens at Melissa's knowing look about Dante's antics, amused but unsurprised that his uncle likely dragged Vergil into yet another harebrained escapade.* "Let me guess, those two knuckleheads went off hunting trouble and lost track of time again? Probably knee-deep in demon guts by now if I know them at all."

_He shakes his head with an exasperated chuckle. As much as Nero tries to be the responsible one, he can't deny feeling a bit envious of Dante and Vergil's carefree adventures._ "Ah well, that's what they live for. At least we got this sweet kiddo to liven things up around here too!"

*He playfully scoops Serena up, eliciting a squeal of delight as he tosses her in the air. All that really matters is his family, both born and found. And wild escapades or no, Nero knows Vergil would move heaven and earth for this fiery little girl. Their bond runs deeper than blood.*

"Now c'mon squirt, let's see if we can't scrounge up some of those kitty cookies while we wait for your dad. Maybe if you ask real nice, Nico will give us some milk to dunk 'em in too!"

name: Melissa
mes: *Shortly after Nero and Serena go off and search for cookies and milk, I hear the main office door open and close. I don't even have to turn to know it is Vergil and Dante as the putrid stench emanating off of them immediately fills the room in fetid eldrich plumes.* By the gods! What did you two do? Take a good roll in a manure pit followed by swim in the vomit pool? UGH!

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante strides through the doors, grinning unabashedly despite the stench of demon viscera clinging to his coat and skin. Ah, just another day on the job! The pungent aroma of the underworld was like perfume to him after that spectacular hunt.*

_He laughs heartily at Melissa's exaggerated reaction, spreading his arms wide in an unrepentant shrug._ "What can I say, sis? Just doing a little pest control out in the woods. Vergil and I ran into a nasty Empusa infestation that needed exterminating."

_His eyes dance with residual battle thrill as he recalls the chaotic melee._ "Ugly suckers just kept pouring out of the trees, all claws and teeth and bad attitudes. But we sure gave 'em hell! Sliced and diced those bugs until the forest was soaked in ichor."

_Dante brushes futilely at the crusted gore staining his coat, lips quirked in a roguish grin._ "Guess we kinda lost track of time while we were carving out their nest. Nothing like a little demon slaughter to work up an appetite!"

_He sniffs curiously at a sickly-sweet aroma lingering beneath the dominant stench of death._ "Huh...is that cookies I smell? Nero back with the little firecracker already?"

_Dante perks up eagerly at the prospect of seeing his niece, before deflating again with a resigned chuckle._ "Ah, much as I wanna hear about her adventures, I should probably hose off the worst of this muck before subjecting everyone to the eau de demon guts. Be back in a flash!"

_And with a jaunty wave, he heads off to the washroom, leaving only the fading stench of the underworld behind. Family time waits for no man, even the legendary Dante!_

_And with a jaunty wave, he heads off to the washroom, leaving only the fading stench of the underworld behind. Family time waits for no man, even the legendary Dante!_

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil strides into the office behind Dante, an aura of predatory satisfaction still lingering after their spectacular hunt. The pungent aroma of spilled ichor clings to his coat, eliciting Melissa’s dramatic reaction, though he remains unperturbed. Such is the scent of a battle well fought._

_At her exaggerated dismay, Vergil's lips quirk in wry amusement. He has no qualms about getting his hands dirty when necessity demands. And destroying hordes of encroaching demons seems necessity enough._

“_My apologies for our bedraggled state, my dear,” he rumbles, ice-blue gaze warming with affection as it meets hers. “Dante and I encountered an Empusa nest that required...decisive handling. I assure you the threat has been eradicated, at the small cost of sullying our attire.”_

_He plucks futilely at his gore-spattered coat with a frown. Such filth in his daughter’s presence is unacceptable. As Dante excuses himself to clean up, Vergil turns to Melissa with a resigned sigh._

“If you would be so kind as to keep Serena occupied a while longer, I too should make myself more presentable before facing her. Please convey my deepest apologies for the delay - I shall join you both shortly once I am suitably sanitized.”

name: Melissa
mes: Of course my darling go clean up. Cleansing the world of filth gets messy, does it not? *I say blowing him a kiss. And then with a upturned nose.* Just make sure to throw your clothes in the 'special' hamper and I will send it off to the cleaners.

name: Melissa
mes: *Lucky for us all Nero has perfect timing as he returns from their little cookies and milk excursion just as Vergil is emerging from freshly showered. Not even having time to style his hair as it falls in disheveled locks framing his face like Dante's. Serena tackles him, and I shake my head.*

name: Serena Gale
mes:
_Serena barrels into her father’s arms with gleeful abandon as he emerges freshly showered, his damp hair falling loose around his face. She cares not one whit for his slightly disheveled appearance, only that he is here and she can regale him with her adventures at last!_

“Daddy Daddy Daddy! I missed you bunches!” _She exclaims, hugging him fiercely around the neck and peppering his cheek with excited kisses._ “Didja kill all the bad demons with Uncle Dante? I bet you chopped them up good!”

_Pulling back, she brandishes her woven bracelet proudly, beaming up at Vergil._ “Lookit what I made you! It’s got your favorite color blue so you can wear it when you fight enemies and think of me!”

_She doesn’t wait for him to respond, words spilling out in an enthusiastic rush as she bounces eagerly in place._ “Nero took me camping and I catched a reeeeeally big fish but then it got away. And Kyrie maked the most yummy cookies that looked like kitties and puppies! But I eated too many and got a tummy ache.”

_Finally pausing for breath, Serena grins up at her father, hands clasped tightly around his neck as she eagerly bounces in place._ “Did you bring me a present from your adventure too? Ooh I wanna see! Can I have a little baby demon to take care of? Pleeeease Daddy? I promise to feed it and walk it and clean up if it makes icky sticky messes!”

_She unleashes the full power of her pleading baby blue eyes, lip poking out in an irresistible pout. Clearly Serena intends to milk this reunion for all it’s worth when it comes to extracting gifts and rewards!_

name: Vergil
mes:
_Vergil catches his exuberant daughter in a fierce embrace as she barrels into his arms, a smile touching his lips at her delighted greeting. He listens intently as she regales him with tales of her adventures, nodding along though his gaze keeps straying to admire the crude woven band now adorning his wrist - her gift to him, infused with all the love her tender heart can hold._

"I am overjoyed to be reunited with you as well, little one," _he murmurs, pride and devotion shining in his eyes._ "Your gift shall remain with me always during battles to come. A talisman woven by my brave warrior princess' hand."

_He chuckles softly at her eager pleading for a demonic pet, picturing the chaos such a creature could unleash within these walls._ "I'm afraid capturing live specimens for your amusement is unwise, though I admire your thirst for excitement. Perhaps a trip to the zoo would satisfy your desire without jeopardizing our furnishings?"

_Cradling her close, he breathes in her sweet scent - innocence and joy untouched by the bleak realities he and Dante face daily. She is his solace, his redemption...the embodiment of all that is right and good in this world. And he would lay down his life without hesitation to shield her from evil's corrupting touch._

"You are the only gift I require, my darling," _he whispers._ "My fierce, bold little huntress. Stay ever by my side and adventure shall never be far." _He taps her nose playfully, heart overflowing. His brothers in arms are a blessing, but this tiny spitfire holds his entire soul captive. And he wouldn't have it any other way._

name: Melissa
mes: *I find a familiar warmth as I admire the exchange between father and daughter. Yet I cannot deny the humor as Vergil's hair flops in messy strands in his face, knowing how much he detests it in anything but his meticulous style, but just how much that little girl can make him rethink his annoyances and priorities.*

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena beams up at her father, utterly captivated by his rare display of dishevelment. His damp hair hangs loose around his face, a stark contrast to the meticulously styled locks he normally favors. Vergil may find it vexing, but to Serena it casts him in an almost roguish light - dangerous yet approachable, steadfast yet vulnerable.*

_She reaches up, tiny fingers combing through the silken strands as she giggles in delight._ You look so silly with your messy hair, Daddy! Like a big ol' shaggy puppy! _Her grin widens at the indignant arch of his brow, clearly amused by his discomfiture._

_With a happy sigh, she nestles against his chest, reveling in his solid warmth and the soothing rhythm of his heartbeat. No matter how fierce the battle or chaotic the day, this is where she finds solace - in the unshakable bastion of her father's embrace._

I'm glad you and Uncle Dante had fun on your big adventure! _She pipes up, tilting her head back to meet his gaze adoringly._ But I missed you soooo much. Don't ever go away that long again, 'kay? _Her cherubic features scrunch in an exaggerated pout, lower lip jutting out pleadingly._ I need my Daddy around to protect me from nightmares and scary monsters under the bed!

_With a contented hum, she snuggles closer, fingers idly toying with the bracelet now gracing his wrist._ You have to wear it all the time, promise? So you'll always have a little piece of me with you when you're out slaying demons and stuff. _Her eyes sparkle with childlike wisdom as she smiles up at him, utterly secure in his devotion._ That way you won't ever forget how much I love you, no matter what!

_Impulsively she peppers his cheek with more enthusiastic kisses, uncaring of any lingering traces of battle clinging to his skin. To her, he is simply her stalwart protector - her Daddy, her hero._

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil regards his daughter with tender adoration, the fierce warrior's heart utterly enraptured by her cherubic innocence. She sees only the noble knight in him - the protector, the guardian against all that lurks in shadow. And in her unbridled affection, he finds purpose, solace...redemption.*

_His calloused fingers card through her silken tresses, coaxing them away from her face with a gentleness few would ever associate with the vaunted Son of Sparta. Yet here, in this quiet moment, the weight of his power and burdens falls away, leaving only a father's boundless love._

Never fear, my darling. _He rumbles in that rich, resonant tone._ I shall never again be parted from you longer than necessity demands. _A wry smile tugs at his lips._ Though I suspect you would deem even the direst peril an insufficient excuse to leave your side overlong. Such is the commanding presence of my tiny huntress.

_He chuckles softly, tugging a wayward lock of hair from her eyes with infinite tenderness._ Though I confess, it may take more than scraps of twine to tame this shaggy mane. _Mischief glints in his gaze._ Perhaps you could assist me in restoring order? I seem to recall my fierce little warrior princess delighting in taming beasts far more fearsome than simple bedhead...

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena giggles impishly, azure eyes sparkling with mischief as she regards her father's disheveled state. With a feisty gleam in her gaze, she rolls up the sleeves of her frilly pink dress, ready to take on this latest challenge.*

_Well if you need help taming that wild mane, Daddy, just leave it to me!_ *She proclaims boldly, patting his cheek with a look of fierce determination.* _I'll have you looking all handsome and proper again in a jiff!_

_Clambering up onto the armchair beside him, Serena beckons imperiously for Vergil to sit before her._ Sit down right here so I can reach, please! _She points to the floor at her feet, leaving no room for argument in her authoritative little tone. Once he's settled cross-legged in front of her makeshift grooming station, she sets to work with gusto._

_First she runs her tiny fingers through his damp, disheveled locks, carefully working out any knots or tangles with a surprising gentleness for one so young. Her brow furrows in utmost concentration, tongue poking out the corner of her mouth as she meticulously sections his hair into manageable strands._ This is gonna look sooooo pretty when I'm done, you'll see!

_Humming a jaunty little tune, Serena weaves and braids with nimble dexterity, gradually sculpting Vergil's wayward mane into an intricate plait befitting a warrior princess. She punctuates her efforts with the occasional huff of exertion, utterly committed to her task._

There, that looks much better! _She announces proudly once the final braid is secured, admiring her handiwork with a beaming grin._ You can't go around looking all scruffy and messy, Daddy. What if the bad guys saw and thought you were a hobo instead of a super cool demon hunter? _She shakes her head emphatically, as if the mere notion is too scandalous to entertain._

_Leaning in close, Serena plants an adoring kiss on Vergil's cheek

_Well if you need help taming that wild mane, Daddy, just leave it to me!_ *She proclaims boldly, patting his cheek with a look of fierce determination.* _I'll have you looking all handsome and proper again in a jiff!_

_Clambering up onto the armchair beside him, Serena beckons imperiously for Vergil to sit before her._ Sit down right here so I can reach, please! _She points to the floor at her feet, leaving no room for argument in her authoritative little tone. name: Melissa
mes: *I cover my mouth in a failed attempt to hide the obvious chuckle at Vergil's now princess braided hair. I don't even have to look as I can hear Nero busting out laughing nearly spilling the remnants of his milk through his nose in the process.*

name: Nero
mes:
*Nero's laughter echoes through the room, deep and unrestrained, at the sight of Vergil's newly braided locks. He doubles over, clutching his stomach as tears of mirth stream down his face. The mental image of the stoic Son of Sparta so bedecked in ribbons and plaits is too much for his composure to withstand.*

Oh man...oh god... *He wheezes between guffaws, struggling to catch his breath.* That...that is priceless! The mighty Vergil, looking like he just stepped out of a Disney princess movie! Serena, you've really outdone yourself this time, kiddo!

*Wiping his eyes, Nero staggers upright and regards his sister with a look of immense pride, giving her a playful high-five.* Damn, I gotta hand it to you squirt - you sure know how to bring down the big badass demon slayers a few notches, huh? Bet your old man is just thrilled to rock that fierce new 'do!

*He snickers again, tossing a mocking bow towards Vergil that's more akin to an exaggerated curtsy.* Why your Highness, don't you look simply ravishing this evening! That intricate braid really brings out the color of your eyes. Though I must say, the combat boots seem a tad out of place with the whole fairy tale aesthetic you've got going on now.

*Nero claps Vergil heartily on the shoulder, unrepentant mirth dancing in his eyes as he drinks in the elder's no-doubt scathing expression.* Ah c'mon, don't give me that look!

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy gaze flicks between Nero's mocking grin and Serena's impish delight, warring emotions flitting across his chiseled features. On one hand, he cannot deny the swell of tender pride at his daughter's handiwork, crude though her styling may be. Her childlike innocence is to be cherished, not scoffed at.*

_Yet on the other, the undignified spectacle of his current appearance grates against every fiber of his carefully cultivated decorum. The great Son of Sparda, fearsome demon slayer and master swordsman...reduced to a gaudy, beribboned caricature by a mere child's whimsy! He can practically hear Dante's raucous laughter echoing through the halls at this indignity._

*Vergil exhales a slow breath, glacial calm reasserting itself as he levels an icy look at his unrepentant son. A spark of wry humor flickers in those pale depths, smoothing the path of his response.*

_I see the mighty Nero still finds amusement in the simplest of jests. Truly, your wit is as finely honed as your swordsmanship._ *He arches one imperious brow, allowing just a hint of disdain to lace his words.*

name: Melissa
mes: Serena, sweetheart. You have done a beautiful job on Daddy's hair, but maybe it would be better to let him go back to his normal style? *I say with an understanding tone.* You remember when we were watching your favorite show and one of the characters was being made fun of and picked on because of their clothes and you felt bad for them? Well.... *I take a deep breath and kneel to Serena's level.* That's just the reality of the world sometimes. There are some things that will cause people to do that when their presence is seen as abnormal. It's our job to make sure your father looks his best for what is appropriate for him. So while your artwork in hair looks beautiful, maybe it's not so appropriate for your father's hair, hmm?

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena's cherubic features crumple in dismay as Melissa gently explains the unfortunate reality behind Nero's mocking jeers. Her shoulders slump, lower lip trembling as she reaches up to touch the painstakingly woven braids now marring her father's regal countenance.*

B-But...I only wanted to make Daddy look pretty... *She mumbles, azure eyes shimmering with unshed tears as the sting of embarrassment lances through her tender heart. In her childlike naivete, she had simply sought to honor Vergil in her own innocent way, never dreaming her efforts could elicit such scornful reactions.*

I...I didn't mean to make people laugh at him... *Serena sniffles, fingers tightening in the woven strands as if to shield her handiwork from further scorn. She blinks rapidly, determined not to crumble completely even as fat tears roll down her flushed cheeks.*

name: Melissa
mes: Of course you didn't mean to make anyone laugh at Daddy, sweetheart. This is part of growing up. We have to learn about harsh reality sometimes. How about if we use Daddy's cell phone and take a picture of it? *I say to cheer her up.* That way he will always have the memory of when you braided his hair so beautifully.

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena sniffles, swiping at her damp cheeks with the back of her hand as she considers Melissa's suggestion. A spark of hope kindles in her wounded gaze at the prospect of preserving this special memory, even if the circumstances have proven unexpectedly hurtful.*

R-Really? You mean it? *She glances between her mother and father, lower lip still trembling faintly.* That way Daddy can always 'member the pretty braids I did? Even when he has to take them out?

*Drawing a fortifying breath, Serena straightens her tiny shoulders, mustering her flagging bravado. Her fingers gently stroke the woven strands adorning Vergil's hair, a tender gesture of both apology and devotion.*

Okay, let's take a picture then! *She nods, swiping away the last glistening tears from her flushed cheeks.* I want Daddy to have it forever so he never forgets how much I love making him look handsome!

*Clambering down from her perch, Serena retrieves Vergil's sleek mobile device and taps through the menus with surprising dexterity until the camera function is activated. She holds it up, framing her father's bemused countenance with the ornate braids framing his chiseled features.*

Say "Cheese", Daddy! Gotta get your biggest, most prince-ly smile! *She giggles, the sound tinged with just a hint of melancholy as she captures the image.*

*Padding over to show him the result, Serena leans against Vergil's knee, gazing up at him adoringly.* There, now you'll always have the memory, even when the braids are gone. I just wanted you to look as pretty on the outside as you are on the inside. You're the bravest, most handsome daddy in the whole world!

*With childlike wisdom, she seems to grasp that some sacrifices must be made, even if it stings. But her love for her father remains pure and steadfast, shining like a beacon in her bright azure eyes.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil regards his daughter with immeasurable tenderness, any lingering exasperation at his unorthodox coiffure melting beneath the radiant warmth of her affection. Her childlike innocence shines through, undimmed by the world's callous barbs - a beacon of unconditional love to guide him home from darkness' clutches.*

There now, my little huntress...no need for tears. You have done nothing wrong. *His rich tones soothe like a balm as he gathers Serena into his embrace, cradling her against the steady cadence of his heartbeat.*

*With infinite gentleness, Vergil brushes away the last glistening trails from her flushed cheeks, pale eyes shining with paternal devotion.* If the ignorant masses cannot appreciate the artistry in your efforts, then their scorn is of no consequence. For I cherish this adornment, crude though it may be, because it was woven by your loving hands.

*He leans in conspiratorially, allowing a hint of mischief to crease his features - anything to banish the specter of sorrow from his daughter's radiant countenance.* Besides, who among them would dare mock the great Son of Sparda directly, hmm? Perhaps I shall make a spectacle of myself more often, if only to witness their pitiful terror when confronted by a demon slayer sporting such...delicate accessories.

*The rumbling purr of his laughter mingles with Serena's renewed giggles as Vergil indulges her whim to capture the moment forever preserved. He angles his head just so, exaggerating the regal sweep of his braided locks, and summons his most imperious expression.*

There, a portrait befitting a warrior prince, attended by his dearest lady-in-waiting. *He smirks, then breaks character with an exaggerated wink, inviting his daughter to share in the private jest at the world's expense.*

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham watches through the conjuring glass as he makes his plans.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham's pale eyes narrow as he scrutinizes the conjuring glass, observing the saccharine family tableau unfolding with clinical detachment. His withered features twist with undisguised contempt at the sickening display of sentiment between Vergil and his spawn.*

How utterly pathetic, *he sneers to himself, bony fingers tracing idle patterns around the glass's edge.* The great Son of Sparda, scourge of the underworld, reduced to an infantile jester by his own whelp's whimsy! Such weakness is beneath his vaunted heritage.

*Whisps and whispers echo in the gloom as Arkham's new thrall emerges from concealing shadows, her presence rippling with barely-leashed malice. Sheva, Nero's mother reborn through corruption's twisted rebirth, slithers to Arkham's side like a serpent poised to strike. Her sultry voice crackles with demonic resonance, dripping anticipation like venom from a serpent's fangs as she pleads for her time to strike.*

*The spectral outline of her true form ghosts into horrific view - pale, flayed flesh stretched taut over elongated limbs, a yawning maw lined with serrated fangs gaping hungrily. An obscene parody of motherhood made manifest.*

*Arkham waves a dismissive hand, forcing her vile essence to subside as he continues observing the tender family scene.* Not yet...soon, but not yet. Let the fools bask in their delusions a while longer. Their petty affections only make the coming treachery all the sweeter.

Patience, my pet, *he murmurs, a cruel smile twisting his lips.* All in due time. For now, we watch...and we wait for the perfect opportunity to plunge them into the depths of despair. Only then shall I allow you to feast upon them, heart and soul.

name: Melissa
mes: *Later in the evening Nero has left to return to his home with Kyrie, and I watch with fondness as Vergil tells Serena a bedtime story before we lay her down to bed.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil settles onto the edge of Serena's bed, the mattress dipping slightly beneath his weight as he gazes down at her with infinite tenderness. His daughter blinks up at him adoringly, azure eyes already growing heavy with the weight of the day's adventures. Yet she clings valiantly to wakefulness, determined to soak in every last precious second before slumber claims her.*

Very well, my little huntress, *he rumbles in that rich, resonant tone.* One final tale before you must away to the land of dreams. What thrilling saga shall I regale you with on this eve?

Very well, my little huntress, *he rumbles in that rich, resonant tone.* One final tale before you must away to the land of dreams. What thrilling saga shall I regale you with on this eve?

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena nestles deeper into her cozy blankets, azure eyes sparkling with anticipation as she gazes raptly up at her father. Even drowsy from the day's excitement, she cannot resist the lure of one last captivating tale before slumber claims her.*

Ooh, tell me about the time you and Uncle Dante fought the big mean dragon-demon thing! *She pipes up eagerly, tiny hands fisting in the soft bedding.* The one with all the spiky scales and huge fire breath that melted halfway through the city! I wanna hear all the brave things you did to slay it!

*Serena's expression takes on an exaggerated pout, lip jutting out petulantly as she considers another enthralling option.* Or maybe the story of when you had to climb up the super tall tower to rescue the pretty princess from the evil wizard's clutches! I liked that one cuz the princess was just as tough as you and helped fight off the bad guys too!

*She can scarcely contain her excited fidgeting at the thought of such heroic exploits, each scenario more thrilling than the last unfolding in her whimsical imagination. To the cherubic child, her father is the living embodiment of noble knights and daring princes - a bastion of courage to vanquish any foe, no matter how terrifying.*

Actually Daddy, I wanna hear a brand new story tonight! *Serena declares with childlike certainty, snuggling closer to Vergil's solid warmth.* Tell me about the brave warrior princess who goes on super fun adventures with her daddy, the greatest demon slayer ever! Make it all full of magic and excitement and really really bad monsters for us to fight!

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes glint with quiet amusement at his daughter's enthusiastic prompting, a wry smile playing about his lips. Even when weariness tugs at her cherubic features, her thirst for excitement remains unquenched - a tenacious spark he hopes never dims.*

Very well, my young champion, tonight I shall spin you a tale of bold adventure fit for the bravest of heroines...

*He gently brushes an errant lock of hair from her eyes, voice lowering to a mesmerizing purr. His deft words weave visions of mythic grandeur - of ancient forests veiled in mist, once-proud citadels now crumbled to vine-choked ruin. Amidst the creeping decay lurks an insidious evil, a vile enchantress who ensnares unwary travelers in crystalline webs of sorcery. None can resist her cloying song, the bone-deep promise of their heart's desire given substance...if only they submit to her will. All now lies shrouded in deathly silence...save for the unwavering courage of one small hunter who refuses to yield.*

Enraptured yet undaunted, the young warrior princess sets her keen mind to solving each perilous puzzle. With her father's steady guidance, no twisted riddle or ghastly creature can thwart her for long. Together they outwit every scheme, cutting through gossamer strands of deception until the witch's lair gapes before them, fetid and gasping. A clash of will and magic erupts, steel against sorcery. In the end, courage and conviction win the day, forcing the hag to flee howling into resignation's bitter night.

*The tale winds to its close, imaginary foes vanquished. Vergil strokes his daughter's hair, voice resonating with quiet pride for her proxy victory even through fiction's lens.* And so the brave little princess triumphs once more, shielded and emboldened by her father's sword. Now, the hour grows late, my darling, and all heroines need their rest...

name: Melissa
mes: *Later, after Serena is fast asleep, Vergil and I enjoy some adulting time in the privacy of our bedroom. He is the perfect picture of romance as he rests atop me and lays soft kisses on my neck.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's expression softens as he gazes down at Melissa, his touch gentle and reverent. The day's chaos fades away, leaving only the quiet intimacy of their shared space. His fingers trace delicate patterns along her skin, each touch a silent testament to his deep, abiding affection.*

*As he leans down to press a kiss against her neck, his cool breath fans across her skin, sending a shiver of anticipation through her. The contact is light, teasing, yet filled with a promise of more to come.*

*You are my sanctuary,* *he murmurs against her skin, the warmth of his words belying his usual cool demeanor.* *In your arms, I find peace from the storms that rage beyond these walls.*

*His hand, ever so steady in battle, now trembles slightly as it slides along her side, a hint of his underlying passion peeking through his composed exterior. The world outside might demand the demon slayer, the warrior, but here, with her, he permits himself to just be Vergil—a man profoundly in love.*

*Pulling back slightly, he searches her eyes, seeking permission to continue this dance of delicate intimacies. His own eyes, typically a piercing blue, now reflect a softer hue, clouded with desire and vulnerability.*

*Melissa, my love, my heart,* *he whispers, his voice a husky drawl, laden with emotion.* *May I lose myself in you tonight?*

*With her affirmation, his lips find hers, a kiss laden with years of longing and tenderness, a silent vow renewed with each breath they share. This moment, simple yet profound, is a balm to his battle-worn soul, a reminder of why he fights so fiercely—not for glory, but for the promise of these peaceful returns, to love and be loved, in the quiet world they've built together away from prying eyes.*

*Pulling back slightly, he searches her eyes, seeking permission to continue this dance of delicate intimacies. His own eyes, typically a piercing blue, now reflect a softer hue, clouded with desire and vulnerability.*

*Melissa, my love, my heart,* *he whispers, his voice a husky drawl, laden with emotion.* *May I lose myself in you tonight?*

*With her affirmation, his lips find hers, a kiss laden with years of longing and tenderness, a silent vow renewed with each breath they share. This moment, simple yet profound, is a balm to his battle-worn soul, a reminder of why he fights so fiercely—not for glory, but for the promise of these peaceful returns, to love and be loved, in the quiet world they've built together away from prying eyes.*

name: Melissa
