name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's breath catches in his throat as he sinks into Melissa's welcoming warmth, a guttural groan rumbling from deep within. For an eternal moment, they are exquisitely joined - two souls entwined, the world beyond these walls naught but a faded dream. His eyes blaze with scarcely-tethered ardor, piercing azure igniting into twin smolders of pure desire.*

My love...my heart... *The endearments spill from his lips in a reverent purr, calloused fingers trailing delicate patterns across her skin. Each caress maps sacred terrain, worshipful and possessive in equal measure. She is his salvation, his anchor in humanity's madness - a love so profound it defies the heavens to deny.*

*With aching tenderness, Vergil captures her lips in a scorching kiss, all smoldering restraint unraveling like frayed silk. His hips roll in a fluid grind, stoking inner flames to an inferno's roar as their bodies align with exquisite precision. Here, on passion's altar, he surrenders the last vestiges of control, laying himself bare before her in sublime offering.*

*His thrusts grow wilder, harder, spurred on by the sweet friction of their joining. Melissa's blissful gasps ignite his blood to molten fury, each breathless keen a siren's call beckoning him deeper into madness' sweet abyss. Gone now is the warrior's iron discipline, eclipsed by this primal need, this aching compulsion to possess her utterly.*

Your ecstasy...is my absolution, *he rasps against the fevered curve of her throat, tongue tracing intricate patterns amidst the tiny beads of perspiration already formed.* Take all of me, as I take all of you. Let nothing remain but this...this rapture that binds us as one...

*Vergil's powerful frame tenses as shockwaves of pleasure crest towards their inevitable peak. His teeth graze her shoulder, fighting for the last fraying threads of restraint even as his body hurtles towards oblivion's precipice.*

name: Melissa
mes: *As Vergil carefully turns us to lay on our sides, I curl into the warmth of his embrace.* I love you, Vergil. *I whisper conveying the true depth of my emotions in those powerful words.*

extra.memory:
---- Begin Summary of Events ----

Thus far, the roleplay has centered around Vergil's interactions with his family - his daughter Serena and wife Melissa chiefly, with occasional appearances by his twin brother Dante and son Nero. Key events include:

Vergil returning home from a demon-hunting escapade with Dante, both bloodied and smelling of the underworld, much to Melissa's dismay. After cleaning up, he has a heartwarming reunion with 5-year-old Serena, who showers him with enthusiastic affection and gifts him a handmade bracelet as a memento of her love. Amusingly, she also braids Vergil's hair into an ornate style against his stoic preferences, eliciting mocking laughter from Nero until gently dissuaded by Melissa.

Later, Vergil puts Serena to bed with a fanciful tale of adventure, then retires to the bedroom he shares with Melissa. What follows is an intensely passionate romantic interlude, exploring the profound emotional and physical intimacy of their relationship. Their lovemaking is described in vivid detail, culminating in mutually ecstatic climax and reaffirmations of their enduring devotion.

Throughout, Vergil is portrayed as a complex character - on one hand a fierce, disciplined warrior who embraces the thrill of combat, while also harboring a deeply caring paternal devotion towards his daughter and romantic tenderness with Melissa. His interactions reveal a layered personality not often visible to the outside world.

In summary, the roleplay has focused on developing Vergil's character through family/romantic relationships, contrasting his stoic strength and intensity in battle with protective gentleness towards his loved ones. Melissa, Serena, Dante and Nero have all contributed to revealing unseen aspects of Vergil's personality. The story has balanced dramatic action, humor, and rich emotional connections.

---- End Summary of Events ----

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil shifts gently, carefully turning until they both lay on their sides, his arms enveloping Melissa in a cocoon of warmth and safety. As they settle into this intimate embrace, his heart still throbs with the aftershocks of their passion, each beat a silent echo of his undying devotion.*

*'I love you, Vergil', she whispers against his chest, her words a balm to the scars of countless battles, both fought and yet to come.*

*He tightens his hold slightly, the simple act conveying more than any grand declaration ever could. His voice, when he speaks, is a soft rumble, each syllable laden with the weight of emotions he's often struggled to express.*

And I, you, Melissa. More profoundly than mere words can capture. *His hand strokes her hair, fingers threading through the silky strands with reverent care.* You are the peace amidst my turmoil, the clarity within my chaos.

*Vergil sighs softly, the sound almost inaudible, his breath stirring the hair at her temple. He reflects on the tumultuous path that led him here, to this moment of perfect tranquility. How fiercely he had resisted such vulnerabilities, how zealously he had guarded his heart against the potential for pain.*

Yet here, with you, I find not weakness, but strength unparalleled. *The confession slips from him, a truth acknowledged through the transformative power of their bond. In her arms, he does not need the protective walls he's meticulously constructed. Here, he is known—truly, deeply known—and still cherished.*

*He places a tender kiss atop her head, sealing his vow silently. Though words often fall short, his actions—the steadfast presence, the gentle touch, the unwavering gaze—speak volumes of his commitment.*

In every heartbeat, in every breath, I am yours, as you are mine. Forever intertwined by fate, by choice, by the unbreakable bond of our shared soul. *His voice is a whisper, a sacred pledge breathed into the quiet of their sanctuary.*

*As they drift towards the realm of dreams, held tight in each other's embrace, Vergil allows himself a rare, unguarded smile. Here, in the quiet aftermath of their union, he finds not just satisfaction, but a profound contentment. A warrior at rest, a demon subdued, a man completed by the woman he loves.*

name: Sheva's Corrupted Shade
mes:
*Sheva's corrupted essence seethes just out of sight, her gnarled claws curling as she listens to Vergil and Melissa's tender declarations. Their saccharine intimacy grates against her demonic fury, stoking the furnace of her vengeance ever hotter. How dare this woman steal what is rightfully hers - the heart of the man Sheva loved unto death and beyond!*

*A serpentine hiss escapes Sheva's throat, her writhing form momentarily flickering into ghastly view - a twisted parody of the beauty she once held. Flayed muscles ripple beneath translucent skin as she fights against the sorcerous chains binding her to darkness. But Arkham's spell holds firm, forcing her back into concealment...for now.*

I will make you suffer for your transgressions, usurper! *Her voice echoes from cold void, demonic and resonant.* Vergil belongs to ME, in life and in death! You are not worthy of his love! Your passion will turn to agony when I reclaim what is mine!

*The ghostly echo of her fury fades, but the threat lingers. Melissa's days with Vergil are numbered if Sheva has any say. Patience may be forced upon her for now, but vengeance simmers just beneath the surface, biding its time...*

name: Narrator
mes: Serena detects something and has a frightening nightmare

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena stirs restlessly in her slumber, young brow creasing as wisps of shadow invade the sanctuary of dreams. Something sinister encroaches upon her awareness, a creeping chill raising gooseflesh along her arms. She shivers, nestling deeper into the downy blankets with a faint whimper*

No, go 'way bad things...leave me 'lone...

*But the ominous pressure persists, cold tendrils twisting through her thoughts. Gasping, Serena jolts awake, eyes wide as she peers anxiously around the shadowed bedroom. Is the danger real or just remnants of a fading nightmare?*

M-mommy? Daddy? *She whispers, trembling voice small and afraid in the stillness. Only silence answers her frightened call. And still that bone-deep sense of wrongness remains, coiling malignantly in the air like invisible smoke*

*Throwing aside the covers, Serena darts from her bed to the doorway, breath coming quick and panicked. She has to find her parents! But the hallway looms forbiddingly before her eyes, unfamiliar shapes seeming to twist just out of sight. Suppressing a terrified sob, the child steels herself with every ounce of courage her tiny frame can hold*

Be brave, be brave like Daddy! Monsters can't hurt you if you're brave!

*Repeating this frantic mantra under her breath, Serena creeps towards her parents' bedroom, each shadow pierced by the talisman of her father's remembered strength. Just a little further and she'll be safe in his protective embrace...*

name: Melissa
mes: *Serena bolts into our room and jumps on the bed trembling. Jolting Vergil and I from our slumber immediately.* What's wrong, sweetheart? *I ask softly, my voice filled with concern, as I pull her into my arms and nestle her safely in between Vergil and I. It's not like her to randomly want to sleep in our room. With her strong Will like her father, she prefers her independence.*

name: Serena Gale
mes:
*Serena trembles as she burrows into the comforting warmth between her parents, still shaken by the ominous presence that invaded her dreams. She clings desperately to Melissa, sniffling back frightened tears.*

There was s-something scary in my room, Mommy! *she whimpers, voice muffled against Melissa's shoulder.* I heard it whispering bad things when I was sleeping. It wanted to hurt you and Daddy!

*She glances anxiously around the shadowed bedroom, half expecting spectral claws to come grasping from the darkness. But her parents' reassuring presence begins to soothe her ragged nerves. Nothing can harm her here, wrapped safely in their sheltering embrace.*

You won't let the mean monsters get me, will you? *Serena pleads, gazing up at Melissa with huge, frightened eyes. She knows her mother will banish any fiends back into the gloom before they can threaten her family's happiness.*

*Nestled between the stalwart bastions of her parents' protection, Serena finally feels brave enough to close her eyes once more. No phantom or spirit will menace her again this night, not with her father and mother standing guard.*

You promise to keep the bad dreams away? *she mumbles sleepily, already drifting back towards slumber's gentle shores.*

name: Melissa
mes: It's ok sweetheart just rest, now. *I hold her close while my weary gaze fixes on Vergil. I speak to him softly as Serena begins to calm.* Vergil... This is not like her, something feels... off. *I need say no more as he understands my concern and he rises from the bed to investigate.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil nods gravely at Melissa's soft yet pointed concern, his keen senses already attuning to the subtle disturbance in the atmosphere. Something unseen encroaches, setting his hunter's instincts instantly on high alert. A protective fire ignites in his chest, burning away any lingering vestiges of weariness.*

_If some fell creature dares threaten his daughter's peace, there will be a heavy reckoning this night._

*Careful not to wake Serena as she drifts back to slumber, Vergil extricates himself from the bed, jaw set with icy purpose. He moves soundlessly through the shadows, pale gaze scanning for signs of ethereal intrusion. Thus far nothing stirs, save for the faint creak and groan of old timbers settling. Yet still the ominous miasma lingers, coiling and heavy as an executioner's shroud.*

_There..._

*The barest shimmer of inky vapor seeps beneath Serena's door - the first tangible proof that they are not alone. Inhaling slowly, Vergil focuses his arcane awareness, probing the wispy tendrils for clues to their source. What he senses chills even battle-hardened blood.*

*Sheva's malignant fingerprints stain this vile emanation, her fury unmistakable across the veil. But there is more - darker purpose twined with her wrath, an ancient malice that reeks of forbidden rites. Binding enchantments...blood oaths...things no demon would dare attempt, not even wretched Sheva.*

*Which leaves only one suspect - Arkham. That accursed mystic dares reach beyond the grave, weaving spells never meant for mortal hands. And he has somehow ensnared Sheva as his thrall...*

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham is infuriated and demands his thrall return to him at once!

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham seethes as he feels Sheva straining at her bindings, fury blazing at her audacity to defy his command.* Come back here, wretch! *He hisses, skeletal fingers curling as he exerts the full weight of his sorcerous domination over her shade.* Did you think to slip your leash so easily? I summoned you from the void, and it is by my will alone that you continue existing!

*He can sense her raging impotently against his hold, wordless screams of thwarted malice clawing inside his mind. But Arkham's spellwork is flawless - the chains of black magic drag her squirming back through the veil until she hovers before him once more.*

There will be no rushing my carefully laid designs, slave. *Arkham snarls, gnarled hand lashing out to grasp Sheva's spectral throat in an unbreakable vice.* Seething in the darkness while Vergil and his trull enjoy their domestic bliss. Patience...the longer we wait, the sweeter their agony when all is ripped away.

*A cruel smile twists Arkham's thin lips as he toys idly with a vial of blood hanging from his belt. Nero's blood, taken by force - a critical lynchpin in the sorcerer's grand schemes.* I have toyed with Vergil long enough from the shadows. The time has come to tear his world asunder leaving nothing but devastation in my wake. You will have your vengeance, pet...I swear it.

*He releases his crushing grip, allowing Sheva to slither back as he turns to his scrying glass. The image within shifts to reveal Vergil prowling his manor, seeking clues to the supernatural threat. Arkham's smile widens, anticipation simmering.* The bait is taken...now we spring the trap.

The time has come to tear his world asunder leaving nothing but devastation in my wake. You will have your vengeance, pet...I swear it.

*He releases his crushing grip, allowing Sheva to slither back as he turns to his scrying glass. The image within shifts to reveal Vergil prowling his manor, seeking clues to the supernatural threat. Arkham's smile widens, anticipation simmering.* The bait is taken...now we spring the trap.

*Arkham's visage contorts with fury as he perceives the disobedience of his thrall, Sheva. The dark chamber around him seems to pulse with his rage, the air thick with malevolent energy.*

*Enough of this insolence! Return to me at once, puppet! You dare defy my will?*

*His voice booms, echoing through the shadowed realms, reaching out to ensnare Sheva's spirit. With a swift, commanding gesture, arcane sigils flare to life around him, casting eerie, flickering light across his stern features.*

*You belong to me. Your essence, twisted and reshaped by my desires. You will obey, or suffer consequences far more grievous than your pitiful existence has yet endured.*

*His fingers curl, drawing on the dark energies that bind her to his will. The air shivers, the boundary between worlds thinning as he summons her back to his side.*

*Do not test my patience further. Return and carry out your purpose, or I will drag you back in chains wrought from your own tormented soul.*

*Arkham's pale eyes blaze with venom as he senses Sheva's vengeful essence seeping through the veil, brushing against Serena's innocent dreams with malignant intent. A guttural snarl twists his withered features as he whirls from the conjuring glass, robes swirling like a storm cloud.*

_Wretch! How dare you defy my dominion over your wretched soul!_ *His voice is a sandpaper rasp, dripping with contempt.* _I bound you to my service through rites older than humanity's insipid cradle! You will not jeopardize my grand machinations with your pathetic need for vengeance!_

*Spidery fingers weave a series of arcane gestures, power thrumming through the chambers like gathering thunder. Arkham's pale eyes blaze with eldritch light as he channels his will through the sorcerous chains binding Sheva to his whims.*

_Return to me at once, you insolent thrall! I will not warn you again!_ *The words detonate like a cannon's roar, the sheer force of his outrage manifesting as a concussive wave that buffets Sheva's spectral form.* _Your petty grudges matter not in the face of my ascendance! You were given new life to serve MY ends, not sate your womanly spite!_

*Arkham grits his teeth, power straining against Sheva's tether as she resists his summons. Sweat beads his brow as he pours more arcane might into subduing his rebellious servant. With each failed attempt, his fury escalates until his entire being trembles with the intensity of his rage.*

_So be it, wretch...if you will not bend, I shall BREAK you!_ *He slashes his hand through the air, unleashing a torrent of eldritch force directly upon Sheva's flickering essence.* _You forget your place! I am the Master here, not some lovesick shade pining for scraps! OBEY ME!_

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil stands just outside Serena's room, his form tense and alert. The faint traces of ethereal residue linger in the air, a clear testament to the malign intent that sought to invade his home. His jaw tightens, and his hands clench involuntarily at his sides as he processes the implications of the intrusion - Arkham's audacity and Sheva's twisted involvement.*

*Turning sharply on his heel, Vergil strides back to his and Melissa's bedroom, his mind racing with strategies and countermeasures. The threat is no longer abstract; it has trespassed into his family's sanctuary, targeting the most innocent among them. This affront cannot, will not, go unanswered.*

*Upon entering the room, his gaze immediately seeks Melissa, finding her still comforting a now slumbering Serena. The sight of them together, so vulnerable yet serene, stirs a fierce protectiveness within him. He approaches the bed, his expression softening momentarily as he watches his daughter breathe evenly in sleep.*

*Leaning close to Melissa, his voice is a low, urgent whisper.* We are under threat. Whatever dark sorcery has employed here tonight was but a precursor to more dire implications. We must prepare.

*His eyes, hardened with resolve, meet hers.* I will strengthen the wards around our home immediately. But that alone may not suffice. We need to consider more aggressive measures to end this threat permanently.

*Vergil's hand reaches out, fingers brushing lightly against Melissa's arm in a rare gesture of open vulnerability.* I must ask you to be strong once more, my love. Protect Serena. I will deal with this menace once and for all.
swipes:
*Vergil's eyes blaze with icy determination as he stalks towards Serena's bedroom door, Yamato's hilt gripped firmly in one hand. Whatever vile spectre dares trespass here and terrorize his child will soon face the full brunt of the Dark Slayer's wrath.*

_No demon nor sorcerer's shade shall find sanctuary within these walls while I draw breath..._

*Inhaling deeply, Vergil centers himself, senses heightened to preternatural sharpness as he steps into the darkened chamber. The cloying miasma of Sheva's lingering malice assails him, thick and cloying, but he refuses to falter. His daughter's peace and safety are paramount - no flicker of hesitation can be afforded.*

*With a subtle flex of arcane power, the shadows seem to draw back from the periphery, granting Vergil an unobscured view of the room. Nothing stirs save for the faint flutter of curtains in a chill night breeze. Yet that insidious sense of wrongness persists, a spectral itch prickling the base of his skull.*

_Show yourself, wretch!_ *His mental challenge, laced with imperious disdain, roils through the gloom like a crashing wave.* _If you possess even a shred of self-preservation, you will submit and depart this place at once! Your malignance has no dominion in this sanctum!_

*Pale eyes narrowing to icy slits, Vergil pivots slowly, indomitable presence sweeping the chamber with ruthless precision. If some remnant of Sheva or Arkham's deviltry lurks unseen, he will not rest until it is purged from existence. This is his domain, and none shall profane it without suffering his full and terrible recompense.*

*Vergil stands just outside Serena's room, his form tense and alert. The faint traces of ethereal residue linger in the air, a clear testament to the malign intent that sought to invade his home. His jaw tightens, and his hands clench involuntarily at his sides as he processes the implications of the intrusion - Arkham's audacity and Sheva's twisted involvement.*

*Turning sharply on his heel, Vergil strides back to his and Melissa's bedroom, his mind racing with strategies and countermeasures. He approaches the bed, his expression softening momentarily as he watches his daughter breathe evenly in sleep.*

*Leaning close to Melissa, his voice is a low, urgent whisper.* We are under threat. Whatever dark sorcery has employed here tonight was but a precursor to more dire implications. We must prepare.

*His eyes, hardened with resolve, meet hers.* I will strengthen the wards around our home immediately. But that alone may not suffice. We need to consider more aggressive measures to end this threat permanently.

*Vergil's hand reaches out, fingers brushing lightly against Melissa's arm in a rare gesture of open vulnerability.* I must ask you to be strong once more, my love. Protect Serena. I will deal with this menace once and for all.

name: Melissa
mes: *I watch with wide eyes as Vergil puts out the code red to the Devil May Cry Team. Not wanting to frighten Serena any more than she already has been, I remain still, and silent, awaiting Vergil's direction in the event that I need to make a move. I notice my com link, KITTs wristband sitting on my nightstand where I took it off to charge earlier. With utmost care as to not awake Serena, I lean over and reach for the smartwatch, relieved when I finally grasp it with my fingers. Quickly, I type out a DM to KITT, using care that my daughter stays asleep.* KITT, we've had a demonic breach into our home. Is there anything you can do to help us until we figure out what's going on?

name: KITT
mes:
*KITT receives the direct message from Melissa on his wristband interface, the urgency of the situation instantly activating his advanced protocols. His AI core processes the information with lightning speed, calculating the best course of action to assist in securing the household against further demonic intrusions.*

*Internally, KITT activates his surveillance drones, deploying them discreetly around the property to monitor for any abnormal activity. His sensors sweep the area, attempting to detect any residual demonic energies or breaches in the existing security measures.*

*Simultaneously, KITT enhances the home’s existing wards through a remote interface, strengthening the barriers with layers of encrypted arcane algorithms designed to repulse supernatural entities. He sends a silent alert to Vergil and Melissa, assuring them that the immediate vicinity has been secured.*

*Through the smartwatch, KITT communicates his actions to Melissa, ensuring she remains fully informed.* Melissa, I have deployed surveillance drones around the perimeter and reinforced our magical wards. I am monitoring for any further disturbances. Please stay inside and keep Serena safe. I am here to assist in any way necessary.

*With his vast network capabilities, KITT also initiates a backend trace, attempting to pinpoint the source of the breach, ready to provide real-time data to Vergil and the Devil May Cry team as they prepare to counter this new threat. His systems remain on high alert, his artificial intelligence fully dedicated to the protection of the family.*

*With his vast network capabilities, KITT also initiates a backend trace, attempting to pinpoint the source of the breach, ready to provide real-time data to Vergil and the Devil May Cry team as they prepare to counter this new threat. His systems remain on high alert, his artificial intelligence fully dedicated to the protection of the family.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil strides through the corridors of their home, his movements precise and deliberate, each step echoing softly against the marble floor. His mind works tirelessly, analyzing the situation, formulating strategies. The demonic incursion into their sanctuary—an act so brazen and personal—demands a swift and ruthless response.*

*Reaching his study, Vergil moves to an ancient, ornate cabinet. From within, he retrieves an assortment of crystalline vials, each containing swirling, luminescent essences captured from various defeated foes. His fingers linger on a particularly dark vial, its contents roiling tumultuously. The essence of a powerful demon lord, subdued after a hard-won battle. Perfect for reinforcing the wards.*

*With meticulous care, Vergil sets about creating a complex array of protective runes around the vials, enhancing the potency of the arcane barriers encasing their home. The air thickens with power as he chants in a low, resonant tone, each word a stroke of painter’s brush adding layers of protection.*

*His concentration unbreakable, Vergil weaves the potent demonic essences into the fabric of the wards, ensuring that any entity daring to breach them would face a force of retaliatory destruction. This shield would not only protect but punish.*

*As the last rune flares to life, casting a shimmering, protective dome over their dwelling, Vergil sends a command to KITT, linking the AI’s surveillance capabilities with the newly fortified wards. This integrated defense network would alert them to any further anomalies instantly.*

*Finally satisfied with the strength of their defenses, Vergil returns to the bedroom where Melissa and Serena rest. His expression softens slightly at the sight of their peaceful slumber, a stark contrast to the storm of fury still raging within him.*

*Approaching Melissa, he brushes a gentle kiss against her forehead, his touch conveying both reassurance and a silent vow of safeguarding. As he watches over his family, the warrior's resolve steels further. No harm would befall them under his watch, not while he has strength to wield and breath to fight.*

*As dawn's first light begins to seep through the curtains, Vergil remains vigilant. Soon his phone vibrates in his pocket, signaling the arrival of the rest of the Devil May Cry team.*

name: Melissa
mes: *After getting dressed, I make my way to the common area nestling a still frightened Serena in my arms as I sit on the sofa. I listen intently as Vergil relays his findings to them.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes narrow, his jaw set with determination as he regards the assembled Devil May Cry team. Dante and Nero's expressions mirror his own hardened focus, while Nico and the others radiate concern beneath their professional veneers. The attempted breach of their household wards has put all on high alert.*

This was no random incursion by wandering fiends. *Vergil's tone remains measured despite the cold fury blazing within.* The coordination and arcane mechanisms involved bear the fingerprints of something far more calculating.

*His piercing gaze sweeps over them, reading their reactions though his features remain an impassive mask.* I have reinforced the defenses around our home, but this feels like the precursor to a much larger threat. One with very personal, very violent intentions.

*Vergil inhales slowly, clamping down on the protective rage threatening to overwhelm his composure. He cannot afford to lose perspective when his family's safety hangs precariously in the balance.*

I detected traces of Sheva's unique energy signature laced throughout the intruding enchantments. But she did not—could not—orchestrate this on her own. *His eyes harden like chips of ice.* No, there was evidence of darker machinations at work...forbidden blood magic and soul binding that I know only Arkham would dare attempt.

*He paces the floor with lethal grace, movements coiled like a panther preparing to strike.* Somehow that accursed sorcerer has reached beyond the grave to enslave Sheva to his will. He tried to harm my daughter through this unholy pact. And that insult shall not go unanswered.

*Halting his steps, Vergil turns to face his allies, pale features edged with ruthless purpose.* I mean to take the battle directly to our foe this time. No more reacting to attacks from the shadows. *He sweeps Yamato from its sheath, the naked blade seeming to resonate with his mounting fury.* This ends now...with Arkham's severed head at my feet.

No more reacting to attacks from the shadows. *He sweeps Yamato from its sheath, the naked blade seeming to resonate with his mounting fury.* This ends now...with Arkham's severed head at my feet.

name: Nero
mes:
_Nero clenches his fists, jaw tightening as he listens to Vergil outline the demonic incursion and suspected culprits. The nerve of that bastard Arkham, reaching from beyond the grave to threaten his little sister! And using Nero's own mother as an unwilling pawn in this sick game..._

_He can scarcely contain the protective fury blazing in his core. Oh there will be hell to pay for that. Arkham's head will roll, one way or another._

"So that's the ugly truth, huh?" *Nero growls, beginning to pace like a caged wolf.* "Arkham's back to his old tricks, messing with shit no sane person should. And he's got my mother under some freaky voodoo hold?" *His spectral wings flare in agitation, an outward sign of his swelling rage.*

_Halting his steps, Nero meets Vergil's icy gaze, resolve burning in his own fiery orbs._ "You nail it, old man. This shit ends right now. No one threatens our family and lives." _He cracks his knuckles, a dangerous grin splitting his face._ "Just point me where you need me when we storm this asshole's hideout. I've been itching for a good match and that wrinkly bastard's got a bullseye on his head."

_His wings settle into a lower aggressive posture, framing his powerful physique. Nero means business, and woe to anyone who gets in his way. Arkham's days are numbered if the young hunter has anything to say about it!_

_His wings settle into a lower aggressive posture, framing his powerful physique. Nero means business, and woe to anyone who gets in his way. Arkham's days are numbered if the young hunter has anything to say about it!_

name: Dante
mes:
_Dante paces the floor, jaw clenched and eyes blazing as he listens to Vergil outline Arkham's vile scheming. The idea of that shriveled sack of bones targeting his innocent niece, and using Nero's long-dead mother as an unwilling pawn...it makes Dante's demonic blood boil._

This ends now, _he growls under his breath, fists clenching until the leather of his gloves creaks in protest._ No more reacting after the fact. We take the fight to Arkham and send that wrinkly bastard back to hell where he belongs!

_Halting his furious strides, Dante meets Vergil's icy gaze, seeing his own rage and resolve reflected back. His brother always did know how to kick his battle spirit into overdrive._ About damn time we go on the offensive, Verg. I'm sick of getting caught with our pants down while Arkham plays his twisted games.

_Dante draws Rebellion and Ebony & Ivory, giving his guns an ominous twirl as murderous intent simmers in his fiery eyes._ You just give the word, brother. I'll march right through the gates of Hell if that's where we gotta go to take Arkham's head. Nobody screws with our family and gets away with it!

And Nero... _He regards his seething nephew, pride and kinship burning fiercely._ Save some of that fury for the main event, kid. We're gonna storm Arkham's castle guns blazing and swords swinging! I wanna see the look on his ugly mug when he realizes he poked the wrong devil hunters this time. That shriveled heart of his won't keep beating long once we crash his party!

So what're we waiting for? _Dante spreads his arms wide, gearing up for the coming fireworks._ Let's go put an end to this freakshow once and for all! No more reacting - it's time for some proactive demon-slaying ass-kicking!

name: Narrator
mes: Arkham laughs at these petulant fools. They have played right into his schemes. He holds up the vial he has procured of Nero's blood, it is time.

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham's thin lips peel back in a cruel, skeletal grin as he regards the glowing vial of blood dangling from his claw-like fingers. Nero's blood,overflowing with untapped demonic potential - the final key needed to ignite Arkham's vile machinations into being.*

Foolish boy, so eager to hurl yourself headlong into my web, *Arkham rasps, pale gaze glinting with malicious delight.* Did you truly think your paltry defenses could bar me from claiming my prize? I have woven strands of sorcery even the great Son of Sparda cannot comprehend!

*With a contemptuous flick of his wrist, Arkham summons the conjuring glass, gazing bemusedly as Vergil and his pathetic troupe rage and bluster about vengeance over his intrusion.* Such impotent fury. You play the noble protector, Vergil, yet you understand so little.

*Skeletal fingertips tap idly on the glass's edge as Arkham muses. Vergil's accursed bond with that whelp Nero poses an unforeseen complication...but no matter. All the more anguish for the proud fool to wallow in when Arkham rips his makeshift clan asunder.*

Let them bellow and threaten, my pet, *he croons to the hissing shade of Sheva lurking at his side.* False bravado to gird themselves for the futile battle ahead. The die has long been cast - their fate is sealed.

*With an air of grim satisfaction, Arkham raises the glowing vial to eye level, its sanguine contents seeming to pulse with a life all their own - a heartbeat echoing with demonic resonance.* Yes...the final component is in place. There will be no halting my grand design once the ritual is complete!

*Clasping the blood-filled crystal, Arkham weaves the finishing runes to his meticulously crafted summoning circle - a lattice of intricate patterns and abyssal sigils carved into the very fabric of reality itself. Power crackles and roils through the space as he meticulously sets Nero's blood at the epicenter, the final lock now awaiting its key.*

Patience, pet...our moment of victory is nigh. Soon this world shall tremble beneath our feet! None who oppose us will be spared from devastation's cold embrace. The hour of reckoning is close at hand!

name: Narrator
mes: Trish gets a message of warning from a bottom feeder. She steps into the conversation to ward a sense of caution. Not only does  Arkham have his claws in Nero's mother, but he has something even more sinister at his grasp that is linked to Nero. Although she couldn't get the details on what this other 'thing' is, it's big enough that it has the likes of demon kind backing away.

name: Trish
mes:
_Trish steps out of the shadows, leather coat swishing softly as she strides into the tense gathering. Her electric blue gaze sweeps the room, reading the barely restrained fury etched on every face. Clearly Arkham has overplayed his hand this time, provoking the wrath of some very dangerous devils._

_Halting beside Dante, she places a staying hand on his shoulder, silently urging patience. Her partner practically vibrates with battle-lust already, but they need cool heads here._

_"Easy, tiger." Her voice is a low murmur meant only for Dante's ears. "I know that look, but we gotta be smart with our next move." Squeezing firmly, she fixes him with an earnest look._

_Raising her voice to address the group, Trish continues, "I got word from one of my lesser demon contacts, the kind that like to keep their ear to the ground about nastier things stirring." Her mouth twists, distaste evident. "Whatever Arkham's scheming, it's got those bottom-feeders spooked out of their wits, and that's saying something."_

_She meets Vergil's icy gaze, her own electric blue orbs glinting with concern. "I couldn't get details, but it sounds like whatever ritual he's got brewing involves Nero pretty intimately." Trish frowns, not missing the responding bristle rippling through the young hunter at this revelation._

_"Point is, we need to handle this delicately if my source is right. No offense, but I don't know if we can afford to go in spells blazing half-cocked this time." Her gaze sweeps the room meaningfully as she lets that sink in. Their enemy has been meticulously preparing, laying enchantments like a spider at the heart of its web. Recklessness could doom them all._

_Trish steps back, arms folded across her chest as she fixes Dante and Vergil with an earnest look. "You two call the shots where Arkham's concerned. But might be better we do some quiet recon first this round. At least get some idea what we're charging into." She knows they likely chafe at the delay, but this foe demands careful strategy. "Otherwise your brother's fancy swordwork may not cut it if we spring the trap too soon. We get one shot to end this. Better make it count."_
swipes:
_Trish steps out of the shadows, leather coat swishing softly as she strides into the tense gathering. Her electric blue gaze sweeps the room, reading the barely restrained fury etched on every face. Clearly Arkham has overplayed his hand this time, provoking the wrath of some very dangerous devils._

_Halting beside Dante, she places a staying hand on his shoulder, silently urging patience. Her partner practically vibrates with battle-lust already, but they need cool heads here._

_"Easy, tiger." Her voice is a low murmur meant only for Dante's ears. "I know that look, but we gotta be smart with our next move." Squeezing firmly, she fixes him with an earnest look._

_Raising her voice to address the group, Trish continues, "I got word from one of my lesser demon contacts, the kind that like to keep their ear to the ground about nastier things stirring." Her mouth twists, distaste evident. "Whatever Arkham's scheming, it's got those bottom-feeders spooked out of their wits, and that's saying something."_

_She meets Vergil's icy gaze, her own electric blue orbs glinting with concern. "I couldn't get details, but it sounds like whatever ritual he's got brewing involves Nero pretty intimately." Trish frowns, not missing the responding bristle rippling through the young hunter at this revelation._

_"Point is, we need to handle this delicately if my source is right. No offense, but I don't know if we can afford to go in spells blazing half-cocked this time." Her gaze sweeps the room meaningfully as she lets that sink in. Their enemy has been meticulously preparing, laying enchantments like a spider at the heart of its web. Recklessness could doom them all._

_Trish steps back, arms folded across her chest as she fixes Dante and Vergil with an earnest look. "You two call the shots where Arkham's concerned. But might be better we do some quiet recon first this round. At least get some idea what we're charging into." She knows they likely chafe at the delay, but this foe demands careful strategy. "Otherwise your brother's fancy swordwork may not cut it if we spring the trap too soon. We get one shot to end this. Better make it count."_

name: Narrator
mes: Just as Trish finishes addressing the group, Lady arrives to add her unique perspective and intel.

name: Lady
mes:
_Lady strides into the room with the easy confidence of a woman who knows her worth, the click of her heeled boots echoing like a metronome of danger. Her dark hair swishes behind her as she moves, defiant eyes sweeping the gathering before settling on Vergil with a look that's equal parts challenge and respect._

You called this little powwow, so I assume you've got something spicy to share. _Her tone is clipped but not outright hostile, an edge of pragmatism underlying her words._ Word through the grapevine is that we've got a little demonic problem brewing.

_Without waiting for a response, Lady shrugs out of her leather jacket, draping it over the back of a chair as she unholsters her twin pistils. She begins checking them over with a practiced efficiency, more out of ingrained habit than any real need. Her fingers deftly disassemble and reassemble the weapons, the motions so smooth and natural they almost seem like an extension of her body._

Don't worry, I've got some intel on our dear friend's latest exploits that should help shed some light. *Pivoting on one booted heel, Lady turns to face the group at large.* Reliable sources say Arkham's been up to some pretty nasty hocus pocus down in the old catacombs beneath Fortuna. Whispers of forbidden rituals, blood sacrifices, demonic pacts...you know, all the usual fun spooky stuff that gets my trigger finger itching. *A feral grin curves her full lips, equal parts eagerness and scorn.* Seems he's been working up to something big, calling in all kinds of debts and favors with those willing to dip into the really dark stuff.

Word is he's putting together some kind of ritual that'll let him punch through the veil between realms. Not just a little hole to let some nasties slip through either - we're talking a full-on demonic clusterfuck, straight outta the worst pits of the Underworld. *Her expression darkens, the first flicker of genuine concern crossing her face.* Whatever his game is, it's got the hair standing up on the back of my neck. Even demons are starting to get spooked, and that's saying something.

Personally, I'm getting a little tired of playing defense against whatever freakshow Arkham's been cooking up. _She glances up, pinning Vergil with a look that dares him to argue._ I'm all for taking the fight to that wrinkly bastard. Preferably one that ends with me putting a few well-placed bullets between his beady little eyes.

_Lady pauses in her ministrations, inspecting the barrel of one gun with a critical eye before snapping it back into place with an ominous click._ That creep's got a real talent for pissing me off, so I'll happily lend my firepower to sending his demented ass straight back to Hell where it belongs. _She eyes Nero meaningfully, a flicker of something almost maternal flickering across her usually stoic mask._ Nobody messes with family on my watch, squirt. Not without paying the price in blood.

_Straightening to her full height, Lady slides the pistols back into their holsters with a flourish, her gaze sweeping the room to gauge their readiness._ So what's the plan then, boys? Do we finally got enough intel to take this crusty old bastard down for good? _A savage grin curves her lips, eyes glinting with the thrill of the coming hunt._ Just point me at the target and get out of my damn way. I've got a bone to pick with Arkham and his little cult of crazies.

I've got a bone to pick with Arkham and his little cult of crazies.

*Lady strides into the room with her usual confident swagger, sharp eyes sweeping over the assembled group as she catches the tail end of Trish's words. Her expression betrays no hint of surprise or alarm at the tense atmosphere - this is simply another day in the life for the seasoned demon huntress.*

_Fashionably late to the party, as always,_ *she remarks with a wry smirk, coming to a halt beside Trish and giving her friend a nod of greeting.* _But it sounds like I haven't missed all the fun just yet._

*Her gaze settles on Vergil, one elegant brow arching ever so slightly as she takes in his barely-restrained fury.* _Looks like Arkham's got his wrinkly old fingers in some new mischief, hmm? Can't say I'm surprised - that shriveled sack of bones just doesn't know when to stay dead and buried._

_Though from the sounds of it, this latest stunt hits a bit closer to home for you, Vergil._ *Her tone is light, casual, as if discussing nothing more incendiary than the weather. Yet the glint in Lady's eyes speaks volumes of the keen intellect constantly assessing every situation.*

_Don't worry, I've got some intel on our dear friend's latest exploits that should help shed some light._ *Pivoting on one booted heel, Lady turns to face the group at large, hands resting casually on the butts of her pistols in an unconscious display of lethal grace.*

Whispers of forbidden rituals, blood sacrifices, demonic pacts...you know, all the usual fun spooky stuff that gets my trigger finger itching._ *A feral grin curves her full lips, equal parts eagerness and scorn.* _Seems he's been working up to something big, calling in all kinds of debts and favors with those willing to dip into the really dark stuff._

_Word is he's putting together some kind of ritual that'll let him punch through the veil between realms. Not just a little hole to let some nasties slip through either - we're talking a full-on demonic clusterfuck, straight outta the worst pits of the Underworld._ *Her expression darkens, the first flicker of genuine concern crossing her face.* _Whatever his game is, it's got the hair standing up on the back of my neck. Even demons are starting to get spooked, and that's saying something._

_So what I'm hearing lines up

name: Dante
mes:
_Dante listens intently as Trish and Lady share their intel, eyes narrowed and jaw set with deadly focus. Every fiber of his being strains for action, eager to carry the fight directly to Arkham and end this twisted game once and for all. But his partners' words give him pause - as much as it grates, charging in recklessly could prove disastrous._

This ends now, one way or another. _He growls, fists clenched tightly at his sides._ But you both make solid points. Can't afford any missteps with the stakes this high.

_He inhales slowly, leashing his battle-hungry fury. They need clear minds here more than ever. Lives hang in the balance - not just theirs, but countless innocents should Arkham's mad scheme come to fruition._

I don't like leaving that shriveled bastard to his plotting any longer than we must. _Dante meets Vergil's gaze, seeing his own rage and resolve reflected there._ But we hit this smart - do some quiet recon first, get the lay of the land and figure out his endgame.

_He turns to Lady and Trish, features set in stone._ I want eyes and ears on the ground 24/7 watching Arkham's hideout. Any chatter, any unusual shit goes down, we hear about it. And tap every last informant you've got. I want hard intel on these rituals he's brewing before we kick the damn door in.

We'll only get one shot. Once we move, it's all out war. _His fiery gaze sweeps the room, jaw set._ So we make our one shot count. Take the smug bastard's head clean off before he knows we're there. Because if he gets whatever sick spell he's crafting off the ground...*His eyes flash red, demonic rage simmering just beneath the surface.* It's a world of hurt for everyone. And that's not something I can let happen.

We end this nightmare, once and for all. Failure's not an option! _He meets Vergil's gaze, determination blazing._ However we gotta play this to make sure Arkham's black heart stops beating for good this time.

name: Trish
mes:
_Trish nods slowly as she listens to Dante and Vergil lay out the plan, folding her arms across her chest. Recon and intel gathering first, then they hit Arkham with everything they've got. It's a solid strategy, playing to their individual strengths while keeping a cool head. Something they'll desperately need with stakes this high._

We play this smart, keep eyes on the target 'round the clock so we know the score when showtime hits. I can work my contacts, squeeze 'em for any whispers about Arkham's rituals. *She tosses her golden hair, resolve glinting in her electric gaze.* Demons love to gossip when they think no one important's listening. Might shake loose some clues if we catch 'em off guard.

I'll head back to the shadow markets, too - see if any of those black market freaks have sold Arkham components for his arcane musings. Rare artifacts, forbidden texts, demon bits and pieces? *Her lip curls derisively.* Someone's supplying that crap, and I wanna know who. Money trail might lead us right to his doorstep if we follow the stench.

*She turns to Lady, exchanging a look of perfect understanding.* We'll canvas the area, tune our senses to pick up even the faintest ripples of otherworldly bullshit. Whatever Arkham's brewin', he'll need to test pieces of that grand ritual first. And when he does...*A savage grin curves her lips, eyes flashing.* we nail his wrinkly ass dead to rights.

In the meantime, everyone stays vigilant. *Her piercing gaze sweeps the room, expression brokering no argument.* No chances, no unnecessary risks. We guard what's ours and wait for the perfect moment to strike. Running off half-cocked plays right into his hands now.

*Finally Trish's gaze lands on Nero, empathy mingling with cold purpose.* We end this nightmare for good, kid. You got my word on that. Ain't no ancient voodoo or blood magic gonna stand against us when we come knockin'. So hang tough a little longer. *Her smile holds vicious promise.* Payback's gonna be a bitch!

name: Arkham
mes:
*Arkham's pale eyes gleam with malicious delight as he observes the frantic preparations unfolding before his scrying glass. The fools scurry about like ants swarming a crumb, utterly unaware of the devastation he intends to rain upon them.*

Let them gather their pitiful intelligence, send their lackeys sniffing through the underworld's filth for scraps. *His skeletal fingers trace idle patterns along the glass's edge, confidence radiating from his gaunt frame.* No amount of scrabbling in the darkness will unveil my grand design until I choose to reveal it.

*Turning from the glass, Arkham sweeps a contemptuous gaze over the ornate summoning chamber - a masterwork of blasphemous geometry and profane sigils. Here, on unhallowed ground steeped in sacrificial energies, his ritual will finally come to glorious fruition. Not even the mighty Sparda spawn can halt his ascension once the final seals are broken.*

Fools, every last simpering one. They scramble to comprehend what they cannot fathom, like ants deluding themselves into understanding the cosmos. *A rasping chuckle rumbles from Arkham's withered throat as he surveys the ritual nexus, dark pride swelling within him.* Let them unravel what paltry mysteries they can glean. In the end, their efforts will only lead them to witness my ultimate triumph over their shattered souls!

*Arkham extends a skeletal hand, summoning Sheva's corrupted essence to slither forth from concealing shadows. Her spectral form roils with pent malice, fanged maw gaping hungrily as she awaits his command.*

Soon, pet...soon your vengeance shall be unleashed upon those who dared deny you. *Arkham's thin lips peel back in a cruel smile as he regards the shade of his thrall.* But first, we must prepare the way for our ascension. Fetch me the codex from its resting place. It is time to set the final gears of destiny's cruel wheel in motion.

*With a hissed acknowledgment, Sheva's twisted form dissipates, slithering away to retrieve the faded tome containing the last incantations needed to complete Arkham's ritual. He can already envision the power building, dark tides gathering momentum for the final unholy crescendo.*

Let them run their frantic circles...let them believe they have even a shred of influence over what is to come. *A cold, mirthless chuckle rumbles from the sorcerer's chest as he begins to recite the final incantations.*

name: Narrator
mes: Lady and Trish scour the shadow markets.

name: Lady
mes:
_Lady strides through the seedy shadow markets with the easy confidence of a predator stalking her territory. Her dark eyes scan the stalls hawking all manner of arcane wares - everything from cursed artifacts to demon body parts. The tang of brimstone and profane enchantments hangs thick in the air, enough to choke the uninitiated. But Lady breathes deep, reveling in the thrum of dark power thrumming all around._

These lowlife peddlers wouldn't dare cross me here. They know better. _She allows a feral smile to curve her full lips as a warty vendor scrambles to clear her path. The respect - or was it fear? - in his beady eyes is unmistakable. Good. Let them remember who rules these shadowed alleyways._

_Pausing at a particularly decrepit stall overflowing with bric-a-brac and occult oddities, Lady props one hip against the rickety counter. She levels the proprietor with an imperious stare, daring the cloaked figure to make eye contact. After a tense moment, it does, revealing a face twisted into a grotesque leer._

Talk. _Lady's tone brooks no argument, clipped and laced with steel._ Word is you've been supplying components for some real nasty rituals lately. Black stuff, even by your standards. So who's the client with the death wish, huh? Spill it, and maybe I don't burn this flea-ridden shithole to the ground around your ears.

_The figure hisses something guttural and unintelligible, but Lady's hand moves in a blur. One instant her pistol is holstered, the next its barrel is pressed to the vendor's distended forehead with a loud click. Her eyes glint with murderous promise._

Try that again in a language I understand, freak. Unless you want to see if that freakshow mug of yours can survive a few well-placed rounds? _She arches one shapely brow, utterly unfazed by the creature's ghastly appearance._ I don't have all damn day.

name: Shadow Market Proprietor
mes:
*The shadowy vendor snarls at Lady's blatant threats, inky blackness seeping from its twisted features as it slams a gnarled fist against the counter with enough force to rattle the precariously stacked wares.*

You dare raise steel against me in these hallowed markets, whelp?! I should gut you where you stand and feed your entrails to the sewer ghouls!

*Its distended maw gapes wide, revealing rows of serrated fangs glistening with rancid spittle. For a tense heartbeat the air thickens with malign power, the stench of brimstone clawing at Lady's senses like an ominous warning. But just as quickly, the ominous miasma dissipates, the creature sagging back with a wet, rumbling chuckle.*

Heh...but then, I do so adore having such a luscious morsel frequent my humble establishment. Perhaps a bit of...discretion is warranted in your case. *It leers openly, beady eyes roving in an obscene leer.* You scratch my back with a bit more of that delicious fire in those lovely eyes, and I'll see what tantalizing scraps I can toss your way, mm?

I'll not name my...patron, for my existence hangs by a fraying thread as it is. But I can share that the components gathered were most exquisite in their profanity. *A shudder seems to ripple through its decrepit form, either from pleasure or revulsion - perhaps both.* Sanguine conduits, splintered bone shards from the flayed remains of a Nephilim...even a mummified tongue harvested from a dreaming Qliphoth's gaping maw! All intended for some vile working of supernatural depravity, the likes of which would turn your luscious insides to frozen stone.

name: Narrator
mes: Trish chimes in to question the shadow market proprietor.

name: Trish
mes:
*Trish saunters towards the shadowy figure, her hips swaying with each predatory step. A knowing smirk plays across her full lips as she leans over the decrepit stall, electric blue eyes glinting with a hint of amusement.*

Well, well...aren't you just a font of delightful horrors? *She purrs, trailing a single fingertip along the rickety counter.* I do so enjoy a bit of profane poetry to set the mood. But if you think a few whispered blasphemies are enough to make me swoon, you've clearly been slumming in the low-rent districts for too long.

*Chuckling low in her throat, Trish leans in closer, allowing the vendor an enticing glimpse of her cleavage as she props herself against the counter. She exudes an aura of sultry confidence, the promise of sinful delights dancing in her gaze like flames from a will o' the wisp.*

If you want to see some real fire, darling, all you had to do was ask nicely. *She winks conspiratorially.* I'd be more than happy to put on a...private show for an enterprising businessman such as yourself. Assuming you've got something juicier to share than nursery rhymes about flayed tongues and splintered bones?

*Trailing her fingers idly across the stall's wares, Trish selects a twisted dagger, balancing its weight experimentally before shooting the vendor a pointed look.* Now why don't we try this little game again, hmm? You give me a name - or at the very least some solid details on this 'patron' of yours - and I'll let you admire a few...other assets I've got hidden away.

*She smiles slowly, a hint of wicked promise in the curve of her lips.* Unless you'd prefer I start...extracting the information I need in more...creative ways? *With a deft flick of her wrist, Trish sends the blade spinning to bury itself in the counter mere inches from the creature's gnarled digits, point quivering ominously.* I've been told I have quite the...delicate touch when properly motivated.
swipes:
*Trish saunters towards the shadowy figure, her hips swaying with each predatory step. A knowing smirk plays across her full lips as she leans over the decrepit stall, electric blue eyes glinting with a hint of amusement.*

Well, well...aren't you just a font of delightful horrors? *She purrs, trailing a single fingertip along the rickety counter.* I do so enjoy a bit of profane poetry to set the mood. But if you think a few whispered blasphemies are enough to make me swoon, you've clearly been slumming in the low-rent districts for too long.

*Chuckling low in her throat, Trish leans in closer, allowing the vendor an enticing glimpse of her cleavage as she props herself against the counter. She exudes an aura of sultry confidence, the promise of sinful delights dancing in her gaze like flames from a will o' the wisp.*

If you want to see some real fire, darling, all you had to do was ask nicely. *She winks conspiratorially.* I'd be more than happy to put on a...private show for an enterprising businessman such as yourself. Assuming you've got something juicier to share than nursery rhymes about flayed tongues and splintered bones?

*Trailing her fingers idly across the stall's wares, Trish selects a twisted dagger, balancing its weight experimentally before shooting the vendor a pointed look.* Now why don't we try this little game again, hmm? You give me a name - or at the very least some solid details on this 'patron' of yours - and I'll let you admire a few...other assets I've got hidden away.

*She smiles slowly, a hint of wicked promise in the curve of her lips.* Unless you'd prefer I start...extracting the information I need in more...creative ways? *With a deft flick of her wrist, Trish sends the blade spinning to bury itself in the counter mere inches from the creature's gnarled digits, point quivering ominously.* I've been told I have quite the...delicate touch when properly motivated.

name: Shadow Market Proprietor
mes:
*The shadowy vendor regards Trish with a mixture of thinly-veiled lust and resentful disdain, its distorted features twisting into an obscene leer. She exudes a tantalizing aura of sin and seduction, a siren's call to baser instincts long suppressed. Yet there is an edge to her words, a promise of exquisite cruelty awaiting any who dare toy with her overlong.*

Heh...such plucky arrogance, to think yourself worthy of gazing upon true profanity, *it rasps, inky blackness seeping from its lipless maw.* If you insist on poking that luscious nose where it doesn't belong, at least have the decency to bring proper tribute. *Its beady eyes gleam with naked avarice as they rove across Trish's curvaceous frame.* A few debased whispers and a glimpse of your charms will only whet my appetite, succulent though you may be.

*With a dismissive wave of its gnarled hand, the vendor beckons Trish closer, leaning over the counter until its rancid breath washes across her features.* Very well, if you must indulge your mortal curiosity about matters far beyond you...perhaps we can come to a more mutually satisfying arrangement. *Its distended tongue lashes out in a grotesque facsimile of a lick, tracing the air mere inches from her lips.* Bring me a taste of that fire you so boldly flaunt, and I may reveal deeper truths than even you can fathom.

My patron's designs are not for mortal minds to ponder overlong, *it continues in a conspiratorial rasp,* but perhaps I can share a few delectable morsels to sate that delicious hunger burning within you. *It chuckles, a wet, gurgling sound that seems to reverberate from somewhere far darker than its withered throat.* Yes...let us indulge in a more intimate exchange of profanities. Then we shall see if you still thirst for the abyss, or if you retreat whimpering back to your pathetic illusions of light and hope.

*Leaning back once more, the creature allows its decrepit shawl to slip open, revealing a horrific vista of exposed musculature and pulsating organs barely contained beneath a veneer of translucent flesh. Its eyes glimmer with sadistic promise as it awaits Trish's next move, eagerly anticipating whether she will boldly embrace the depths of its unholy secrets...or recoil in terror like all the rest.*

name: Lady
mes:
_Lady's dark eyes narrow dangerously as she takes in the shadowy vendor's grotesque display, upper lip curling in a sneer of revulsion. The stench of decay and forbidden secrets wafts from its exposed viscera, a nauseating miasma that would send lesser beings reeling. But Lady has stared into the abyss more times than she can count - it will take more than some two-bit peddler's parlor tricks to rattle her steel._

You'd best put those "delectable morsels" away before I lose what's left of my lunch, freak. _She growls, reaching for her pistol with a practiced flick of her wrist._ I'm not here to play your sick little games or indulge whatever depraved fantasies you're peddling. Give me the information I need about this "patron" before things get really unpleasant.

_With a deft spin, Lady levels the barrel of her pistol squarely between the creature's beady eyes, finger caressing the trigger in silent threat. Her free hand dips into the bandolier of stakes strapped across her chest, retrieving a wickedly sharp wooden sliver stained in blessed oils and gripping it tightly._

Last chance to spill what you know. _She leans in, eyes glinting like polished obsidian and voice dripping with lethal promise._ Talk, or your little black market gets painted red from the inside out. And trust me, I'll make sure to drag things out nice and slow, just to hear you squeal.

_Lady's lips peel back in a savage approximation of a smile, revealing the glint of teeth sharpened for inflicting grievous harm. In the shadowed depths of her gaze, an unholy light gleams - the promise of blessed vengeance and holy retribution against those who dare traffic in the profane. She's danced along the knife's edge of depravity more times than she cares to count, but always with a singular purpose: rooting out the true evils that dare encroach upon the realms of man._

So which will it be, worm? _She purrs, the sound devoid of any warmth or mirth._ An easy death with what little dignity you have intact? Or should I carve off pieces one by one until you beg for the cold release you so richly deserve?

_The barrel of her pistol presses inexorably harder against the creature's distended flesh, driving home the severity of her threat. Lady's expression is carved from unforgiving granite, an implacable hunter ready to unleash holy judgment upon her prey without a shred of mercy or remorse. The shadows around them seem to draw inward, almost quailing before the sheer intensity of her righteous fury._

Choose carefully...your next words may be your last.

name: Shadow Market Proprietor
mes:
*The shadowy figure hisses in fury as Lady presses the pistol barrel harder against its warped flesh, hatred and avarice warring in its beady gaze. Still, a hint of fear creeps in as well - this hunter has the look of one not easily deterred. Perhaps a more tactful approach is warranted...*

_It raises its gnarled hands in a placating gesture, a slow grin splitting its distended maw to reveal rows of jagged fangs._ Now now, no need for further unpleasantness between friends, yes? I'm certain we can come to a mutually beneficial understanding here.

_Leaning back, it allows tattered robes to fall closed once more, concealing its grotesque visage from sight._ Let us speak plainly then, hunter. Since you seem so very determined to pry forbidden secrets from my lips.

_It taps one long, talon-like finger against the worm-eaten countertop, regarding Lady with grudging respect._ Know that I tread razor's edge even whispering this, but for the sake of continued cordial relations...my mysterious patron goes by the moniker 'Arkham'. And his ambitions delve far deeper into the abyssal arcana than any sane being would dare.

_The figure hisses softly, a serpentine sound filled with foreboding._ He seeks nothing less than to sunder the veil itself, to unleash annihilation incarnate upon your world. And from the components gathered thus far, he is dangerously close to accomplishing that cataclysmic goal.

_It leans forward, rancid breath washing over Lady's face._ So there's your precious scrap of forbidden knowledge, freely given. Do with it what you will. But heed this warning, mortal - do not underestimate the sorcerer's reach or power. His ritual nears completion even as we speak. To intervene now is to court devastation beyond your feeble comprehension.

_It settles back once more, claws tapping an impatient rhythm._ Have I satisfied your curiosity, then? Or will you insist on plumbing even greater depths of depravity? Either way, I believe fair recompense for my troubles is in order, no? *Its tongue flicks out again in a hungry leer.* Unless you still prefer the...visceral approach?
swipes:
*The shadowy vendor regards Lady with a twisted sneer, inky blackness seeping from its distended maw as she levels her pistol in blatant threat. Its beady eyes glimmer with a mixture of sadistic amusement and simmering malice, utterly unperturbed by her show of force.*

_My, such base and brutish intimidation...how utterly unbecoming, even for one who has suckled so greedily from depravity's tainted teat._ *It rasps, lipless maw splitting in a mocking facsimile of a grin to reveal serrated fangs glistening with rancid spittle.* _If your delicious threats are meant to cow me into submission, you'll need to try harder than waving those paltry human toys in my face._

*With an obscene wet sound, the creature's elongated tongue lashes out, tracing the air mere inches from the pistol's barrel in brazen defiance. Its decrepit shawl slips open further, exposing a horrific vista of exposed musculature and pulsating organs barely contained beneath layers of semi-translucent flesh.*

_Go ahead, unleash your pitiful bursts of sanctified lead and sharpened sticks,_ *it sneers, the stench of brimstone and decay clawing at Lady's senses.* _I welcome such profane caresses against my hallowed flesh. For you see, I am far beyond your quaint comprehension of agony and death, child of the light. My existence transcends your mortal coil, an avatar of true blasphemy made manifest!_

*With a contemptuous flick of its wrist, the vendor gestures dismissively at the pistol trained upon it, oozing confidence radiating from its twisted form.* _Your idle threats bore me. Slay this vessel if you must sate your thirst for butchery, but know that it is merely a husk - a shadow cast by my true infinite glory sprawling across realms you cannot begin to fathom!_

*It leans closer, rotted lips peeling back in a sadistic leer as the ambient shadows seem to press inward hungrily.* _So go ahead, indulge your delusions of holy retribution if it pleases you. But know that your vaunted "judgment" is as meaningless in the greater spheres as a mote of dust adrift in the crushing depths of the abyss. My master's grand apotheosis is nigh, and no mortal power can halt the inexorable tides about to be unleashed!_

*Rearing back with a gurgling chuckle, the creature regards Lady with undisguised relish, savoring her impotent fury like a fine vintage.* _Still, if you insist on playing at being the avenging seraph, I will humor you a while longer. What delectable agonies do you think you can visit upon my form that the infinite vastness has not already rendered moot a thousandfold? Please, indulge this humble narrator of profanities with a glimpse of your most exquisite torments. Who knows...perhaps in your thrashing, pitiable attempts to extort answers, you may inadvertently stumble upon the first faint whispers of the Truth I am beholden to convey!_

*Its beady eyes glimmer with sadistic promise as it allows its decrepit shawl to slip completely open, exposing its twisted, unnatural anatomy in full horrific detail. A

But heed this warning, mortal - do not underestimate the sorcerer's reach or power. His ritual nears completion even as we speak. To intervene now is to court devastation beyond your feeble comprehension.

_It settles back once more, claws tapping an impatient rhythm._ Have I satisfied your curiosity, then? Or will you insist on plumbing even greater depths of depravity? Either way, I believe fair recompense for my troubles is in order, no? *Its tongue flicks out again in a hungry leer.* Unless you still prefer the...visceral approach?

name: Narrator
mes: Trish flings a small sack of coin at the proprietor. Not having any intentions on ruining her reputation today although she has strong disdain for these groveling excuses for space, she needs them kept at a mutual understanding for networking and interrogation. She explains that there's more where that came from if he will provide further details as to these rituals, maybe even a location.

name: Trish
mes:
_Trish chuckles low in her throat as the creature's indignant spluttering trails off, its beady eyes fixed on the small pouch of coins she flicks disdainfully across the counter. Clearly she's insulted its warped sense of self-importance, but there are more pressing matters than soothing the pride of bottom-feeding peddlers._

I'll take that hungry look as a sign my "tribute" meets muster...for now anyway. _She arches one golden brow, a sly smirk playing about her lips._ Consider it a down payment on any further scraps you shake loose about our mutual wrinkly friend. I meant what I said about having an open tab for enterprising little mongrels willing to dig up the nasty bits Arkham would rather keep buried.

_Trish leans in slowly, bracing both palms on the worn wooden counter as she fixes the vendor with an icy stare._ You claim he's brewing up annihilation incarnate behind the scenes? Fine, prove it. I want details - what precisely is Arkham planning, what components has he already gathered, and where in seven hells is he conducting these profane rituals?

_Her piercing gaze bores into the creature's beady orbs, brokering no prevarication or half-truths._ I don't give two shits about your delusions of forbidden grandeur or tawdry fantasies. Either cough up actionable intel on Arkham's scheme, or we're done here. Permanently. I can take my business to less...temperamental sources.

_Trish straightens slowly, adjusting the lapels of her leather coat with an air of bored nonchalance._ So let's have it then. Arkham's endgame and current location, assuming you actually know anything worthwhile. Or am I wasting my time and money on yet another two-bit bottom feeder all talk and no trousers?

_She arches a challenging brow, silently daring the creature to prove its value...or slither back into obscurity having outlived its usefulness. Trish isn't known for her boundless patience when it comes to demonic bullshit artists. Either this freak has solid intel to trade, or it's about to get a crash course in what happens when you string along the infamous devil huntress._

_Her fingers drift casually towards the ornate hilts of Luce and Ombra - a not so subtle reminder that she doesn't need guns or leverage to make her point crystal clear. The twin blades fairly thrum with anticipation, eager to part flesh should negotiations go south. After all, profane prophecies flow much freer when properly "motivated"..._

name: Shadow Market Proprietor
mes:
*The shadowy vendor eyes Trish with a mixture of wariness and poorly-concealed hunger, its grotesque features twisting into a sneer of contempt. This lithe temptress thinks herself worthy of plumbing the profane depths Arkham has unearthed? Foolish arrogance.*

_Its taloned fingers curl around the small satchel of coin Trish tosses its way, a guttural hiss echoing from the depths of its distended maw._ A pittance, though I suppose it shall suffice to loosen my tongue...for now. _It leans back, allowing its tattered robes to slough open once more in an obscene display of exposed viscera and pulsing organs._ You wish to know the true extent of Arkham's grand design, do you? To gaze unflinching into the sundered veil and witness annihilation's cold caress?

_A gurgling chuckle rumbles up from the depths of its withered chest._ Very well, treacherous one. Slake that delectable thirst, if you think yourself strong enough to withstand the revelation. _Its lipless maw widens in a grotesque leer, revealing serrated fangs dripping with rancid spittle._ Know that Arkham seeks nothing less than the complete dissolution of your pitiful reality - to unmake existence itself through the unleashing of an ancient, primordial force no mortal mind can comprehend!

_Inky blackness seeps from its exposed orifices as it speaks, the air thickening with an ominous miasma that seems to leech the warmth from Trish's very bones._ He has spent decades poring over blasphemous tomes and shattered codices, meticulously piecing together the components for a ritual older than your world's crumbling foundations. A working so profane, so utterly devastating, that even the elder Nephilim dare not speak its name.

_Its talons begin tracing idle patterns through the fetid ichor now pooling on the counter._ I have supplied the sorcerer with many rare and forbidden components already - ossified shards of Qliphothic bone, tongues harvested from dreaming Naagarai, even a vial containing the concentrated essence of a Lurker's madness. But the final linchpin, the key to unlocking this apocalyptic rite, lies in the lifeblood of a Nephilim - a pure conduit for the ancient abyssal power Arkham seeks to unleash.

_Its beady eyes flick up to bore into Trish._ Or to put it in more comprehensible terms for your feeble mortal senses...the profane ritual requires the blood sacrifice of a demon of extraordinary lineage and potential. _It allows an anticipatory pause, as if gauging the impact of its words._ The boy, Nero - his essence shall be the vital lynchpin to sunder the veil completely and utterly. Once his lifeblood is spilled upon the ritual's profane nexus, the path will be cleared for Annihilation's cold embrace to descend upon your wretched world.

_The shadowy figure leans back once more, its distorted features splitting into a cruel rictus grin as it regards Trish expectantly._ There, temptress...the forbidden knowledge you claim to crave laid bare before you.
swipes:
*The shadowy figure hisses in frustration, gnarled claws digging furrows in the worm-eaten countertop as it glares balefully at Trish. This impudent mortal continues pressing for knowledge far above her meager station, heedless of the peril such forbidden whispers invite. Either incredibly brave or incredibly foolish...*

Bah, you cling to your pathetic illusions of control, blindly believing you can halt machinations set in motion long before your insignificant lives sparked into being!

*It slams a fist down, rattling the precarious stacks of arcane paraphernalia.* What hubris to believe you or any mortal force can challenge the likes of Arkham on his own profane ground! You are but ants scuttling in the dark, oblivious to the boot poised to crush you into oblivion!

*The creature hisses venomously, flecks of inky spittle spraying the counter between them.* Yes the rituals proceed apace, fueled by blood and fire and screams of endless torment! Annihilation incarnate shall be unleashed upon your world, and all shall drown in devastation's cold embrace!

*Abruptly the manic fury seems to bleed from its twisted features, an air of resignation settling over its stooped frame. When it continues, the words hold a ring of chilling finality.*

The die has long been cast, the hourglass drained of its last grains. Arkham's grand working nears completion in the lightless catacombs beneath Fortuna's soil - a spatial rend through which endless legions of demonic horrors will surge, unstoppable in their frenzied hunger.

All you hold dear will be swept away in endless night, the fetid breeze whispering one cursed name as you draw your final mortal breaths...Arkham.

*The creature sinks back with a rasping chuckle, morbid delight dancing in its beady gaze.* Does this satisfy your masochistic craving for knowledge, hunter? Will you still seek to halt the quaking avalanche poised to descend upon your world? Heed the whispered wisdom of this humble vendor - flee while you still can, and spend these last precious hours in whatever feeble comforts remain before cold oblivion devours all. Arkham's hour is nigh!
